content: Cov lug nuav yog Tavi tug tub Xalaumoo kws yog cov Yixayee tug vaajntxwv le paaj lug
ua kuas tau tswvyim hab paub kevcai ua neej, hab to taub tej lug txawj ntse,
khaws tej lug qhuab qha kws qha kev thoob tswb to nrog hab kev txav txem ncaaj hab kev ua ncaaj hab qhov kws ua ncaaj nruab nraab,
muab txujkev thoob tswb to nrog rua tug kws tsw paub qaabhau, muab kev txawj ntse hab kev paub txhwj paub txhua rua tug hluas.
Tug txawj ntse tau nov hab tsaav kev paub rua nwg, hab tug kws thoob tswb to nrog yuav tau peevxwm ua num,
sub txhad nkaag sab paaj lug pev lug, hab nkaag sab cov txawj ntse tej lug hab tej txhaj mim txwv.
Qhov kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub yog lub hauv paug txawj ntse, tug ruag yeej saib tsw taug tswvyim hab tej lug qhuab qha.
Kuv tub 'e, ca le noog koj txwv tej lug qhuab qha, hab tsw xob muab koj nam tej lug qha tso tseg,
tsua qhov tej lug hov yog lub mom paaj ntoos zoo nkauj sau koj taubhau hab yog tej saw nyaj ntawm koj cej daab.
Kuv tub 'e, yog tej tuabneeg muaj txem ntxag koj, tsw xob yeem moog.
Yog puab has tas, “Nrug peb moog, ca peb moog zuv kev tog tua tuabneeg, ca peb moog zuv kev tog tug kws tsw ua txhum muab ntaus ua sw.
Ca peb muab nwg nqog caj yaam le tub tuag teb, hab nqog kheej ib yaam le puab cov kws nqeg rua huv qhov tuag.
Peb yuav tau tej hov txhua chaw tswm txaj txhua yaam, peb yuav muab tej kws peb txeeb tau lug ntim puv nkaus huv peb tej tsev.
Koj ca le nrug peb koom, peb suavdawg yuav koom ib lub naas nyaj.”
Kuv tub 'e, tsw xob nrug puab moog, yuav tsum tswj koj txhais kwtaw ntawm puab txujkev,
tsua qhov puab txhais kwtaw dha moog ua phem, hab puab maaj nroog moog txuv luas lug ntshaav.
Cuab vaag rua noog pum yeej tsw tau qaabhau.
Tassws cov tuabneeg nuav nyaag zuv tog puab tug kheej le ntshaav, hab zuv kev txuv puab txujsa.
Txhua tug kws ua nruj ua tswv es tau nyaj txag yeej yuav zoo le nuav, tej nyaj txag hov yuav rov txuv puab txujsa.
Tswvyim hu nrov nrov ntawm tej kev, nwg tsaa suab hu ntawm tshaav puam.
Nwg tuaj sau tej ntsaa loog hu hab pav ntawm rooj loog kws nkaag rua huv lub nroog, has tas

“Mej cov kws tsw thoob tswb 'e, mej yuav nyam txujkev tsw thoob tswb moog ntev le caag? Hab cov kws thuaj luas yuav zoo sab thuaj moog ntev le caag? Hab cov kws ruag yuav ntxub kev txawj ntse ntev le caag?
Mej ca le tig qhov ntsej noog kuv tej lug qhuab ntuag. Saib maj, kuv yuav nchuav tej kws kuv xaav huv lub sab rua mej, kuv yuav muab kuv tej lug qha tseeb rua mej.
Kuv tub hu los mej tsw yeem noog, kuv tub cev teg los tsw muaj leejtwg quav ntsej,
hab mej tsw yeem txais yuav kuv tej lug taw qha, hab tsw yeem yuav kuv tej lug qhuab ntuag hlo le.
Vem le nuav kuv yuav luag qhov kws mej raug kev puam tsuaj, hab kuv yuav luag rua thaus kws mej ntshai raag zum zawg,
hab thaus kev ntshai raag lug raug mej zoo yaam nkaus le cua daaj cua dub, hab kev puam tsuaj lug raug mej yaam le khaub zeeg cua, hab thaus kev txom nyem kev nyuaj sab lug raug mej.
Mas puab yuav thov kuv los kuv yuav tsw teb. Puab yuav swv zug nrhav kuv tassws nrhav tsw tau.
Vem puab ntxub kev txawj ntse hab tsw xaiv yuav qhov kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub,
hab puab tsw yuav kuv tej lug taw qha hlo le hab saib tsw taug kuv tej lug qhuab ntuag huvsw,
vem le nuav puab yuav saws lawv le tej kws puab ua, hab puab tej tswvyim ua phem rua luas yuav rov raug puab pov khawv nkaus.
Cov tuabneeg tsw thoob tswb raug tua vem yog puab tsw quav ntsej tej lug qha, hab cov tuabneeg ruag raug puam tsuaj vem yog ua laag ua taa.
Tassws tug kws noog kuv yuav nyob tso sab plhuav, hab yuav nyob kaaj sab lug tsw txhawj tsw ntshai ib yaam kev phem hlo le.”
Kuv tub 'e, yog koj khaws kuv tej lug ca hab muab kuv tej lug nkaw ceev rua huv koj lub sab,
hab yog koj tig ntsej quas ncuv noog tug tswvyim hab tig lub sab lug nrhav kev to taub,
yog koj hu nrhav kev txawj ntse hab tsaa ncauj thov kev nkaag sab,
yog koj nrhav tswvyim ib yaam le nrhav tej nyaj, hab nrhav ib yaam le nrhav tej nyaj txag kws muab zais ca lawm,
yog koj ua le nuav koj yuav to taub qhov kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub hab txawj paub txug Vaajtswv.
Tsua qhov Yawmsaub yog tug kws pub tswvyim, tej kev txawj ntse hab tej kev nkaag sab yog tawm huv Yawmsaub qhov ncauj lug.
Nwg ceev tug tswvyim  ca rua cov kws sab ncaaj, nwg yog daim hlau tiv thaiv cov kws ua neej dawb huv.
Nwg ceev txujkev ua ncaaj ua nceeg hab nwg tsom kwm nwg cov tuabneeg dawb huv.
Mas koj yuav paub txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab kev txav txem ncaaj hab ua ncaaj nruab nraab hab paub ua qhov zoo rua txhua faab.
Tswvyim yuav nkaag rua huv koj lub sab, hab kev txawj ntse yuav ua kuas koj tug ntsuj plig xyiv faab.
Kev txawj ntse yuav tsom kwm koj, hab kev to taub yuav tiv thaiv koj,
hab yuav paab koj dim txujkev ua phem, hab dim cov tuabneeg ntxeev xaiv.
Puab tso txujkev ncaaj nceeg tseg, taug txujkev tsaus ntuj.
Puab yeej zoo sab ua phem hab nyam tej kev phem ntxeev ntxag,
yog cov kws taug txujkev nkhaus, puab yog tuabneeg sab nkhaus xwb.
Koj yuav dim ntawm tug puj plhu tuab, yog tug puj cov zej cov zog kws has lug qaab rog qaab ntse,
nwg muab nwg tug quasyawg kws thaus hluas nkauj nwg yuav tso pov tseg, hab tsw ncu txug tej lug kws nwg cog tseg rua nwg tug Vaajtswv lawm.
Nwg lub tsev yuav coj moog txug txujkev tuag, nwg tej txujci yuav coj moog rua huv tub tuag teb.
Cov kws moog cuag nwg tsw muaj ib tug rov qaab lug le, tsw muaj ib tug kws yuav rov lug taug tau txujkev kws caj sa.
Yog le ntawd koj yuav tsum taug cov tuabneeg zoo txujkev, hab coj lawv le cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tug cujpwm,
tsua qhov cov kws sab ncaaj yuav tau nyob huv lub tebchaws, hab cov kws ua sab dawb paug yuav tau nyob ruaj rua huv.
Tassws cov tuabneeg limham yuav raug muab txav tu huv lub tebchaws, hab cov tuabneeg ntxeev ntxag yuav raug muab dob hlo caag.
Kuv tub 'e, tsw xob nov qaab kuv tej lug qha, koj lub sab yim meem ncu ntsoov kuv tej lug nkaw,
tsua qhov tej nuav yuav pub koj nyob ntev naj ntau xyoo, hab pub koj vaam meej nyob kaaj sab quas lug.
Koj tsw xob muab txujkev hlub hab txujkev ua ncaaj tso tseg. Ca le muab khi rua ntawm koj cej daab hab muab sau ca rua huv koj lub sab.
Luas txhad le saib taug koj hab koj yuav tau koob meej zoo ntawm Vaajtswv hab tuabneeg.
Koj ca le tso sab plhuav rua Yawmsaub kawg sab kawg ntsws, koj tsw xob vaam khom koj le kev txawj ntse.
Ca le leeg yuav nwg rua txhua txujkev kws koj moog, mas nwg yuav pub koj taug txujkev ncaaj.
Tsw xob xaav has tas koj txawj ntse. Ca le fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub hab tig hlo ntawm txujkev phem.
Qhov kws koj ua le nuav yuav ua rua koj lub cev nyob zoo hab ua koj tej pob txhaa swb quas laag.
Ca le fwm Yawmsaub hab muab koj tej hov txhua chaw xyeem rua nwg, hab muab thawj phaum qoob loos txhua yaam pub rua nwg,
mas koj lub txhaab yuav puv nkaus, hab kua txwv maab yuav puv koj lub rhawv phwj yog.
Kuv tub 'e, tsw xob saib tsw taug Yawmsaub tej lug qhuab qha, hab tsw xob dhuav nwg tej lug ntuag,
tsua qhov Yawmsaub qhuab ntuag tug kws nwg hlub, ib yaam le leej txwv qhuab ntuag tug tub kws nwg zoo sab rua.
Tug kws nrhav tau tswvyim hab txawj nkaag sab mas kaaj sab lug,
tsua qhov tswvyim muaj nqes dua nyaj txag hab muaj tshaaj thawj dua kub.
Tswvyim tswm txaj dua npauj nyaj npauj kub, hab txhua yaam kws koj ntshaw tsw muaj ib yaam zoo cuag le tswvyim.
Tswvyim saab teg xws tuav txujsa ntev, saab teg phem tuav kev muaj txag hab koob meej.
Tswvyim txujkev yog txuj kws tshaav ntuj quas lug, hab nwg txhua txujkev yog kev sws hum xeeb.
Tswvyim yog tsob ntoo kws pub txujsa rua cov kws tuav rawv nwg, cov kws tuav rawv tswvyim ca ruaj, luas yuav hu tas kaaj sab lug.
Yawmsaub swv tswvyim tswm nplajteb, hab swv kev nkaag sab nthuav lub ntuj.
Nwg swv nwg kev txawj ntse ua kuas dej txhawv huv nruab tiv txwv lug, hab ua kuas fuab tso dej lwg lug.
Kuv tub 'e, koj ca le ceev tug tswvyim hab kev txawj ntse, tsw xob ca ob yaam nuav tswv dhau ntawm koj lub qhov muag moog.
Ob yaam nuav yuav ua txujsa rua koj hab yuav yog tej saw kub ntawm koj cej daab.
Tes koj yuav ua koj lub neej tso sab plhuav hab tsw dawm teg dawm taw.
Yog koj nyob tsawg, los koj tsw ntshai daabtsw, thaus koj pw los yuav tsaug zug zoo sab tug quas yeeg.
Koj tsw xob ntshai tej kws ua rua koj ceeb kws tshwm plawg lug taamswm, hab tsw xob ntshai tej kev puam tsuaj kws tej tuabneeg limham raug,
tsua qhov Yawmsaub yuav yog koj lub chaw vaam khom, nwg yuav tiv thaiv tsw kheev koj txhais kwtaw maag rooj hlua.
Koj ca le ua zoo rua cov kws tswm nyog tau qhov zoo rua txhua lub swjhawm kws koj ua tau.
Yog kwvtij zej zog cheem tsum ib yaam daabtsw kws koj muaj, mas tsw xob has tas, “Koj rov qaab moog pigkig rov tuaj es kuv le muab.”
Tsw xob ntaus tswvyim ua phem rua tej kwvtij zej zog kws nyob ze koj hab tso sab rua koj.
Yog luas tsw tau ua phem rua koj mas tsw xob laam nrug luas sws caav sws tshe.
Tsw xob khib tug tuabneeg ua limham ndais ntuj, hab tsw xaiv taug nwg tej kev txuj twg hlo le,
tsua qhov Yawmsaub ntxub tug tuabneeg sab nkhaus, tassws nwg nrug tug kws ua ncaaj nceeg sws raug zoo.
Lu lug kws Yawmsaub foom tsw zoo yuav poob rua sau tej tuabneeg limham lub tsev, tassws nwg yuav foom koob moov rua tej tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg lub chaw nyob.
Nwg yuav luag tej tuabneeg kws luag lwm tug, tassws nwg yuav hlub tej kws txu fwjchim.
Tug tuabneeg txawj ntse yuav tau koob meej, tassws tug tuabneeg ruag yuav poob ntsej muag.
Kuv cov tub 'e, mej ca le noog mej txwv tej lug qhuab qha, hab ua tuab zoo noog, mej txhad le txawj ntse.
Tej lug kws kuv qhuab qha mej zoo heev, tsw xob muab kuv tej lug pov tseg.
Thaus kuv tseed yau kws nrug kuv txwv nyob, hab yog tuab tug tub mog kws nyob huv kuv nam lub qhov muag,
mas kuv txwv qha kuv hab has rua kuv tas, “Koj ca le tuav rawv kuv tej lug rua huv koj lub sab, ua lawv le kuv tej lug nkaw txhad muaj txujsa nyob.
Ca le nrhav kuas tau tswvyim hab kev txawj ntse, tsw xob nov qaab, tsw xob tig ntawm tej lug kws kuv lub qhov ncauj has.
Tsw xob muab tswvyim tso pov tseg, mas nwg yuav tsom kwm koj, ca le nyam nwg, mas nwg yuav tiv thaiv koj.
Lub hauv paug kws muaj tswvyim yog le nuav, yuav tsum nrhav kuas tau tswvyim, txawm yog koj khaws tau daabtsw kuj xwj, koj yuav tsum khaws kuas tau kev txawj ntse.
Yuav tsum fwm tswvyim heev, mas nwg yuav txhawb nqaa koj. Yog koj puag rawv tswvyim, nwg yuav pub koob meej rua koj.
Nwg yuav muab lub mom paaj muaj meej ua rua koj ntoo, hab yuav muab lub mom kub zoo nkauj rua koj.”
Kuv tub 'e, ca le noog hab khaws kuv tej lug ca, sub koj txujsa txhad le nyob ntev naj ntau xyoo.
Kuv tub qha tswvyim txujkev rua koj, kuv tub coj koj ua lub sab ncaaj.
Thaus koj taug kev yuav tsw muaj daabtsw thaiv koj kev, thaus koj dha koj yuav tsw dawm.
Ca le tuav rawv tej lug qhuab qha ua neej, tsw xob muab tso tseg, ca le muab tej lug qha ceev ca tsua qhov tej lug ntawd yog koj txujsa.
Koj tsw xob nkaag moog rua huv tej tuabneeg limham txujkev, tsw xob taug cov tuabneeg phem txujkev.
Yuav tsum zos kev tsw xob taug txuj ntawd, ca le zos moog kuas dhau.
Cov tuabneeg phem yog tsw tau ua txhum mas pw tsw tsaug zug, yog puab tsw tau ua rua leejtwg dawm qaug mas puab tsw tuaj daab ndub.
Puab tej mov noj yog qhov kws puab ua limham, puab tej cawv txwv maab haus yog qhov kws puab ua nruj ua tswv.
Tassws cov ncaaj nceeg txujkev mas zoo yaam nkaus le tug duab tshaav ntuj kws ci zuj zug thaus taagkig moog txug thaus tshaav ntuj kub lawm.
Cov tuabneeg limham txujkev mas tsaus ntuj nti, puab tsw paub tas puab dawm daabtsw.
Kuv tub 'e, ua tuab zoo noog kuv tej lug, tig koj lub qhov ntsej noog tej kws kuv has.
Koj tsw xob ca kuv tej lug tswv dhau ntawm koj lub qhov muag moog, koj yuav tsum khaws ca rua huv koj lub sab,
tsua qhov kuv tej lug yog txujsa rua tug kws nrhav tau, hab ua rua tug hov lub cev nyob zoo huvsw.
Koj yuav tsum ua tuab zoo tswj koj lub sab rua txhua faab tsua qhov txujsa txhawv tawm huv lub sab lug.
Ca le muab koj tug nplaig nkhaus pov tseg, hab muab tej lug daag tshem deb ntawm koj lub qhov ncauj.
Ca koj lub qhov muag saib ncaaj nraim rua tom hauv ntej, hab ca koj tsom ntsoov koj lub hauv ntej saib xwb.
Koj yuav tsum saib ntsoov txujkev kws koj txhais taw taug, koj txhua txujkev txhad le ruaj.
Tsw xob tig rua saab xws lossws tig rua saab phem, ca koj txhais kwtaw tig hlo ntawm txujkev ua phem.
Kuv tub 'e, ua tuab zoo noog kuv tej tswvyim, hab tig koj lub qhov ntsej noog kuv tej kev txawj ntse,
sub koj txhad le khaws tau txujkev txawj ntse ca, hab koj lub qhov ncauj yuav tuav txujkev paub.
Tug quaspuj plhu tuab daim tawv ncauj qaab zwb ib yaam le zwb ntaab, nwg tej lug nplag dhau roj.
Thaus kawg nwg yuav ab le tswb dais hab yuav ntse yaam le raab ntaaj ob saab ntse.
Nwg tshais ruam moog rua huv txujkev tuag, nwg txhais kwtaw taug txujkev kws moog rua huv tub tuag teb.
Nwg tsw quav ntsej taug txujkev kws tau txujsa, nwg tub yuam kev lawm los nwg tub tsw paub le.
Kuv cov tub 'e, nwgnuav mej ca le noog kuv has, tsw xob tig ntawm tej lug kws kuv lub qhov ncauj has.
Koj yuav tsum zos kev deb ntawm tug puj hov, hab tsw xob moog ze nwg lub qhov rooj,
tsaam tes koj muab koj lub koob meej rua lwm tug lawm, hab muab koj txujsa rua cov tuabneeg kws tsw taab ncuab,
hab lwm haiv tuabneeg yuav noj koj tej nyaj txag tsau npo, hab tej kws koj khwv tau yuav poob rua lwm haiv tuabneeg tej vaaj tse.
Thaus koj lub neej kawg koj yuav ntsaaj quas lawg, yog thaus koj lub cev nqaj daim tawv raug muab rhuav tshem taag,
hab koj yuav seev has tas, “Yog thau kuv ntxub tej lug qhuab qha hab kuv lub sab saib tsw taug tej lug qhuab ntuag.
Kuv tsw noog kuv cov xwbfwb has hab tsw tig qhov ntsej noog cov kws qhuab qha kuv.
Kuv tub yuav puam tsuaj taag huv ib tsoom tuabneeg kws tuaj txoos ua ke.”
Yuav tsum haus dej huv koj lub thoob xwb, yog cov dej kws txhawv huv koj lub qhov dej lug.
Tswm nyog ca koj lub qhov dej ndwg tawm rua nrau tog vaaj tog tsev, hab koj cov dej ndwg taug tej kev lov?
Ca cov dej hov ua koj tuab leeg feem, tsw xob muab rua luas lwm tug.
Yuav tsum ca koj lub qhov dej txhawv tau koob moov, hab ca le zoo sab rua tug quaspuj kws thaus koj hluas koj tau lawm.

Nwg zoo nkauj yaam le tug xyuas muas lwj hab cev yag ntxag zoo le tug xyuas kauv. Ca nwg lub xubndag ua rua koj zoo sab kawg txhua lub swjhawm, hab ca koj qaug sab rua nwg txujkev hlub kev nyam tsw tu le.
Kuv tub 'e, ua le caag koj yuav qaug sab rua tug quaspuj plhu tuab, hab puag tug puj cov zej cov zog lub xubndag?
Tsua qhov Yawmsaub pum ntsoov tuabneeg tej kev, hab nwg saib ntsoov txhua txujkev kws puab moog.
Tej kev txhum kws cov tuabneeg limham ua, rov cuab maag nwg, hab nwg maag nwg lub txem rooj hlua.
Nwg tuag vem yog nwg tsw tswj nwg lub sab, vem yog nwg ruag kawg le nwg txhad yuam kev.
Kuv tub 'e, yog koj ua tug laav kwvtij zej zog hab tau cog lug tseg rua lwm tug lawm,
yog koj maag khi vem yog tim koj daim tawv ncauj, hab yog koj maag hlua vem tim koj lub ncauj tej lug,
kuv tug tub 'e, koj yuav tsum ua le nuav txhad paab tau koj dim, tsua qhov koj poob rua huv kwvtij zej zog txhais teg lawm. Ca le maaj nroog moog thov nwg.
Tsw xob ua ntsej muag laag dig, tsw xob qe muag nti.
Koj ca le tswv kuas dim ib yaam le tug kauv seb tswv dim tug kws tua nqaj, hab ib yaam le tug noog nti dim huv tug kws cuab txhais teg.
Nam tuabneeg cis nkeeg 'e, koj ca le moog saib ntsaum, ca le ua tuab zoo saib ntsaum nyob tau le caag, koj txhad le txawj ntse.
Ntsaum tub tsw muaj thawj coj, tsw muaj num tswv, tsw muaj tug kaav,
los lub caij ntuj qhua ntsaum tseed txawj npaaj zaub mov ca, hab lub caij sau qoob ntsaum txawj sau lug ca.
Tuabneeg cis nkeeg 'e, koj yuav pw ntev le caag? Thaus twg koj le sawv huv nruab daab ndub lug?
Tsaug ib nyuas tswg zug, ib nyuas qe muag, khawm teg su ib plag,
mas txujkev pluag yuav lug txug koj yaam nkaus le tub saab tuaj lws, hab kev txom nyem yuav lug yaam nkaus le tug coj ntaaj coj rag tuaj lws.
Tug tuabneeg tsw tswm txaj, yog tuabneeg limham, daag taug zej taug zog,
nwg zwg ncauj ntxw muag, nwg ua teg ua taw ntxag, nwg taw teg nki,
nwg lub sab nkhaus xaav tswvyim ua phem, nwg pheej tshaum kuas muaj kev tsw sws hum.
Vem le nuav vej sub vej sw yuav lug raug nwg sai sai, ib plag ntshws xwb yuav raug kev puag ntsoog khu tsw tau.
Muaj rau yaam kws Yawmsaub ntxub, yog muaj xyaa yaam kws nwg ntxub kawg le, yog le nuav
qhov muag qauj luj leg, nplaig daag, hab txhais teg kws tua tug tuabneeg tsw txhum,
lub sab kws ntaus tswvyim ua limham, txhais kwtaw kws maaj nroog moog ua phem,
tug cuav timkhawv kws ua paa xwb los puavleej yog daag, hab tug kws tshaum ua rua kwvtij tsw sws hum.
Kuv tub 'e, ca le tuav rawv koj txwv tej lug nkaw hab tsw xob muab koj nam tej lug qha pov tseg.
Muab tej lug hov khi rua koj lub sab moog ib txhws, muab khi rua ntawm koj cej daab.
Thaus koj moog kev tej lug hov yuav coj koj, thaus koj pw tej lug hov yuav tsom kwm koj, hab thaus koj sawv tej lug hov yuav qha koj.
Tsua qhov tej lug nkaw hov yog lub teeb ci hab tej lug qha hov yog qhov kaaj, hab tej lug qhuab ntuag yog qha koj paub ua neej,
sub txhad tiv thaiv koj ntawm tug quaspuj phem hab tiv thaiv ntawm tug puj cov zej cov zog ncauj qaab zwb nplaig qaab ntse.
Koj tsw xob qaug sab rua qhov kws nwg zoo nkauj, tsw xob ca nwg txav muag ntxag tau koj.
Ib lub ncuav xwb ndav tau tug puj muag cev, tassws qhov kws moog nrug luas tug quaspuj pw mas yuav txuv koj txujsa.
Ib tug txwvneej yuav puag nplaim tawg rua ntawm nwg hauv sab es nwg lub tsho tsw kub nyab tau hab lov?
Lossws ib tug txwvneej yuav tsuj sau cov ncaig tawg kws kub heev es nwg txhais kwtaw tsw kub nyab tau hab lov?
Tug kws moog nrug luas quaspuj pw kuj zoo ib yaam le ntawd. Tsw muaj ib tug twg kws kov luas tug quaspuj es yuav tsw raug txem.
Yog tub saab nyag lug noj vem nwg tshaib heev mas tsw muaj leejtwg thuaj nwg.
Yog nteg tau mas nwg yuav them xyaa npaug, nwg yuav muab tej hov txhua chaw huv nwg tsev huvsw them.
Tug kws ntxag luas quaspuj yeej yog tsw thoob tswb, tug kws ua le ntawd kuj yog nwg rov rhuav nwg ua kuas puam tsuaj.
Nwg yuav raug luas nplawm hab poob ntsej muag, ntxuav tsw tau nwg qhov txaaj muag pluj le.
Qhov kws khib xeeb ua rua tuabneeg npau tawg kawg nkaus, mas nub kws nwg pauj taub nwg tsw tswj nwg tug zug le.
Nwg yuav tsw kaam yuav ib qho nyaj saam fwm le, txawm yog yeem muab ntau los nwg yeej tsw yib.
Kuv tub 'e, koj ca le khaws kuv tej lug ca, hab muab tej kws kuv qha ceev rua huv koj lub sab.
Ca le tuav rawv kuv tej lug nkaw txhad muaj txujsa nyob, ca le tuav kuv tej lug qha ca zoo cuag nkaus le koj tsom kwm koj lub ntsab muag.
Muab khi rua ntawm koj ntiv teg, hab muab sau ca rua huv koj lub sab.
Ca le has rua tswvyim tas, “Koj yog kuv tug muam hlub,” hab hu kev txawj ntse tas yog koj tug kwvluag zoo,
sub tug tswvyim hov txhad tsom kwm koj dim tug quaspuj plhu tuab, yog tug puj cov zej cov zog ncauj qaab zwb nplaig qaab ntse.
Kuv nyob huv kuv tsev ntawm qhov rais xauj cov kem qhov rais moog rua saab nrau.
Kuv pum cov tuabneeg ruag. Kuv saib ntsoov cov tub hluas hov mas muaj ib tug tsw thoob tswb to nrog
taug kev tuaj ze ntawm kev tshuam kws tug puj hov nyob, hab taug txuj kws moog rua huv tug puj hov tsev,
yog lub swjhawm yuav tsaus ntuj hab tsaus ntuj zuag, hab thaus tsaus ntuj ndais dub dub le lawm.
Na cav, muaj ib tug puj ntswb nwg naav tsoog yaam nkaus le tug puj muag cev, nwg lub sab ntxeev ntxag.
Nwg muaj plhu ntxag kwv tawv kwv cov, nwg kwtaw nyob tsw tswm huv tsev le,
ib plag nyob tom kev ib plag nyob tom tshaav puam, nwg tog quas nrhw txhua txuj hauv kev.
Nwg khawm nkaus tug hluas hov hab muab nwj kag, nwg has rua tug hluas tsw paub txaaj muag le has tas,
“Kuv tua tsaj xyeem, hab nub nua kuv pauj yeem lawm.
Kuv txhad le tawm tuaj nrhav koj, muaj sab nrhav mas kuv ntswb koj lawm.
Kuv tub muab ntaub pua kuv lub txaaj pw du quas lug lawm, yog muab cov ntaub maag Iyi kws txaij nraug zeeg zoo nkauj pua.
Kuv tub muab roj tsw qaab hab roj ntoo alau‑es hab moov ntoo tuv txhawb kuv lub txaaj tsw qaab quas ntxag le.
Moog ca ib pw ua ke pov khawv ib mos kaaj ntug, ca ib ua kuas txaus sab txaus ntsws ntawm txujkev sws nyam,
tsua qhov kuv tug quasyawg tsw nyob tsev, nwg moog kev deb le lawm.
Nwg coj ib naas nyaj moog lawm, hli nraa nwg le rov qaab lug.”
Tug puj hov ua lug mog lug muas haub ntxag tug hluas ntawd, nwg tej lug qaab zwb yuam tau tug tub hluas.
Nwg txhad lawv lag tug puj hov moog taamswm, yaam nkaus le tug txwv nyuj kws moog rua lub chaw tua, yaam nkaus le tug muas lwj dha moog maag hlua,
moog txug thaus luas raab xub chob nkaus rua nruab plawv. Yaam le tug noog pluav moog maag tswg, tug hluas hov tsw paub tas tub moog txug qhov chaw tuag lawm.
Kuv cov tub 'e, mej ca le noog kuv has, ua tuab zoo noog tej lug kws kuv qhov ncauj has.
Tsw xob qaug sab lawv tug puj hov, hab tsw xob tig moog taug nwg txujkev,
tsua qhov nwg tub txuv tau ntau tug lawm, cov kws nwg muab tua pov tseg coob kawg le.
Nwg lub tsev yog txujkev kws moog rua huv tub tuag teb, hab yog txuj kws nqeg moog rua huv qhov ntxaa.
Ca le noog tswvyim lub suab hu. Kev txawj ntse tsw tsaa lub suab hu lov?
Tswvyim sawv sau qhov chaw sab ntawm ntug kev, hab ntawm tej kev tshuam.
Tswvyim nyob ntawm ib saab rooj loog kws nkaag moog rua huv lub nroog hu nrov nrov has tas,
“Tuabneeg 'e, kuv hu mej, kuv tsaa suab hu ib tsoom tuabneeg.
Mej cov tuabneeg tsw thoob tswb 'e, ca le kawm kuas paub qaabhau, mej cov tuabneeg ruag 'e, ca le kawm kuas nkaag sab.
Ca le noog los maj, tsua qhov kuv yuav has txug tej kws zoo tshaaj plawg, hab tej kws raug cai yuav tawm huv kuv daim tawv ncauj lug,
tsua qhov kuv lub qhov ncauj yuav has qhov tseeb xwb, kuv daim tawv ncauj ntxub tej kev limham kawg le.
Txhua lu lug kws kuv lub qhov ncauj has puavleej yog lug ncaaj nceeg, tsw muaj ib lus daag hab ib lus nkhaus le.
Tug kws txawj to taub yuav pum tas kuv tej lug puavleej ncaaj, tug kws kawm kev txawj ntse yuav pum tas kuv tej lug raug cai lawm.
Ca le khaws kuv tej lug qhuab qha zoo dua le khaws nyaj, ca le khaws kev txawj ntse zoo dua le khaws cov tseem kub,
tsua qhov tswvyim zoo dua le npauj nyaj npauj kub, hab txhua yaam kws koj ntshaw tsw muaj ib yaam zoo cuag le tswvyim.
“Kuv yog tswvyim, kuv muaj taab faab, hab kuv nrhav tau kev txawj ntse hab paub txhwj paub txhua.
Qhov kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub yog ntxub txujkev phem. Kuv ntxub kev khaav theeb kev muab hlub, kev phem kev qas hab lub ncauj ntxeev xaiv.
Kuv yog lub chaw sablaaj ntxwg nug hab muaj tswvyim, kuv thoob tswb to nrog hab muaj zug.
Vem muaj kuv, tej vaajntxwv txhad kaav tau tebchaws, hab tej num tswv txhad rhawv tau kevcai ncaaj nceeg.
Vem yog muaj kuv, cov thawj txhad kaav tau tebchaws, hab cov kws muaj meej mom txhad kaav tau thoob nplajteb.
Kuv hlub cov kws muab sab npuab kuv, hab cov kws swv zug nrhav kuv kuj ntswb kuv.
Kev muaj txag hab koob meej, hab peev nyaj qaab naas nas qaab zeg hab kev vaam meej nrug nraim kuv.
Tej txaj ntswg kws koj tau ntawm kuv zoo dua kub, zoo dua cov tseem kub, tej kws koj tau ntawm kuv zoo dua cov tseem nyaj.
Kuv taug txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab moog lawv le txujkev ua ncaaj.
Kuv pub nyaj txag rua cov kws muab sab npuab kuv, hab pub kuas puab lub txhaab nyaj puv nkaus.
“Thawj ntswg num kws Yawmsaub ua yog nwg tau tswm kuv, kuv yog thawj yaam kws thau u nwg tswm.
Nwg tswm kuv thau u lug lawm, thaus chiv keeb nwg tswm kuv ua ntej kws tsw tau muaj lub nplajteb.
Thaus tsw tau muaj dej havtxwv tub yug kuv lawm, yog thaus tsw tau muaj tej qhov dej kws txhawv ntau.
Ua ntej kws tsw tau tswm tej roob hab ua ntej kws tsw tau muaj tej pov roob, tub yug kuv lawm,
yog thaus Yawmsaub tsw tau tswm lub nplajteb hab tej laj teb, hab tsw tau tswm tej aav huv nplajteb.
Thaus nwg tswm lub ntuj kuas nyob ruaj, hab thaus nwg kuam ib tug nrwm rua dej havtxwv, kuv yeej nyob hov ntawd lawm,
yog thaus nwg tswm lub ntuj kuas ruaj khov, hab thaus nwg ua kuas dej txhawv huv nruab tiv txwv lug,
yog thaus nwg kem nrwm rua dej havtxwv, dej txhad tsw nyaab dhau qhov kws nwg tso cai, hab thaus nwg ntsuag pua daim laag zeb tag lub nplajteb.
Kuv nyob ntawm Yawmsaub ib saab, ib yaam nkaus le tug Kws ua tsev kuv ua rua nwg muaj kev zoo sab txhua nub, kuv xyiv faab rua ntawm nwg xubndag tsw tu le.
Kuv xyiv faab rua lub nplajteb kws yog nwg le hab xyiv faab rua ib tsoom tuabneeg.
“Kuv cov tub 'e mej ca le noog kuv has. Cov kws tuav rawv kuv txujkev yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Ca le noog lug qhuab qha, ca le txawj ntse, hab tsw xob tso tej lug qha pov tseg.
Tug kws noog kuv has yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug, yog tug kws naj nub zuv tog ntawm kuv lub rooj loog, hab tog ntawm kuv ib saab qhov rooj.
Tug kws nrhav tau kuv kuj nrhav tau txujsa, hab tau kev hlub ntawm Yawmsaub.
Tassws tug kws nplaam kuv lawm, nwg ua rua nwg mob xwb, txhua tug kws ntxub kuv kuj yog nyam kev pluj kev tuag.”
Tswvyim tub ua nwg lub tsev, nwg tsaa xyaa tug ncej.
Nwg tub tua nwg tej tsaj hab tub tov cawv txwv maab lawm hab tub rau zaub mov rua sau rooj lawm.
Nwg khaiv nwg cov nkauj qhev moog tuaj sau tej chaw sab huv lub nroog hu nrov has tas,
“Leejtwg ruag qhwv ca le nkaag lug rua ntawm nuav.” Tswvyim has rua cov tsw thoob tswb has tas,
“Ca le lug, nrug kuv noj mov hab haus cov cawv txwv maab kws kuv muab tov lawm.
Ca le muab txujkev ruag pov tseg txhad muaj txujsa nyob, ca le taug txujkev txawj ntse.”
Tug kws ntuag tej tuabneeg thuaj luas, yuav raug tshev, tug kws qhuab ntuag tej tuabneeg limham, yuav raug lu lug phem.
Tsw xob qhuab ntuag tug kws thuaj luas vem nwg yuav ntxub koj, qhuab ntuag tug txawj ntse mas nwg yuav nyam koj.
Yog qhuab qha tug kws txawj ntse mas nwg yuav ntse tuaj, yog qha tug ncaaj nceeg mas nwg yuav kawm paub ntau dua tuaj.
Qhov kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub yog lub hauv paug tswvyim, qhov kws paub Vaajtswv tug dawb huv yog kev txawj ntse.
Vem yog muaj tswvyim, yuav muaj lub caij nyoog ntxwv rua koj, hab yuav tsaav koj nyob ntev naj ntau xyoo.
Yog koj ntse mas kuj yog koj ntse paab koj, yog koj thuaj luag koj yuav thev koj ib leeg xwb.
Txujkev ruag zoo yaam nkaus le tug quaspuj ncauj ntau, nwg kwv tawv kwv cov tsw paub txaaj muag.
Nwg nyob tsawg ntawm nwg lub qhov rooj hab nyob sau tej chaw sab huv lub nroog.
Nwg hu rua cov kws dua kev tuaj moog, yog cov kws luas taug luas kev xwb,
hu has tas, “Leejtwg ruag qhwv ca le nkaag lug rua ntawm nuav.” Nwg has rua cov kws tsw thoob tswb has tas,
“Tej dej kws moog nyag lug haus qaab zwb, hab cov mov kws noj nraim quas nkoog kuj qaab heev.”
Tassws puab tsw paub tas muaj tuabneeg tuag huv qhov chaw ntawd, hab nwg cov qhua tub poob tub kawg rua huv tub tuag teb lawm.
Xalaumoo tej paaj lug. Tug tub ntse ua rua leej txwv zoo sab, tug tub ruag ua rua leej nam nyuaj sab.
Tej nyaj txag kws ua limham tau lug tsw muaj nuj nqes, tassws txujkev ncaaj nceeg cawm kuas dim kev tuag.
Yawmsaub tsw ca cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tshaib, tassws nwg tsw pub cov tuabneeg limham tau lawv le kws puab ntshaw.
Txhais teg cis nkeeg yuav pluag, txhais teg nquag yuav ua rua nplua nuj.
Tug tub kws sau qoob loos rua lub caij ntuj qhua mas nwg paub taab, tassws tug tub kws tsaug zug lub caij sau qoob yuav coj kev txaaj muag lug.
Tej koob moov yuav lug rua sau cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg taubhau, tassws cov tuabneeg limham lub qhov ncauj npog txujkev ua nruj ua tswv.
Qhov kws ncu txug cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yog tau koob moov, tassws cov tuabneeg limham lub suab lub npe yuav lwj taag.
Tug kws lub sab muaj tswvyim nwg yuav muab tej lug nkaw saib hlub, tassws tug kws ruag ncauj ntau yuav raug kev puam tsuaj.
Tug kws ua lub sab dawb paug yuav nyob ruaj khov, tassws tug kws coj nkhaus suavdawg yeej yuav paub.
Tug kws zwg ncauj ntxw muag kuj ua kuas muaj kev ntxhuv, tassws tug kws muaj cuabkaav ntuag ua kuas nyob sws hum xeeb.
Cov kws ncaaj nceeg lub qhov ncauj yog lub qhov dej txhawv kws pub txujsa, tassws tug tuabneeg limham lub qhov ncauj npog txujkev ua nruj ua tswv.
Txujkev sws ntxub tshaum kuas muaj kev sws caav sws tshe, tassws txujkev hlub yuav tswj tau txhua yaam kev txhum.
Yuav tau tswvyim ntawm tug kws thoob tswb to nrog daim tawv ncauj, tassws raab nplawm yuav ntaus tug kws tsw thoob tswb nraus qaum.
Cov kws muaj tswvyim yuav khaws kev txawj ntse ca, tassws qhov kws tug ruag ntau ncauj coj kev puam tsuaj lug ze.
Tug nplua nuj tej nyaj txag yog nwg lub nroog ruaj khov, tassws tug pluag txujkev pluag yog nwg txujkev puam tsuaj.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tej nqe zug yuav coj moog tau txujsa, cov tuabneeg limham tej nqe zug yuav coj moog saws lub txem.
Tug kws noog lug qhuab qha kuj nyob huv txujkev kws tau txujsa, tassws tug kws tsw leeg yuav tej lug qhuab ntuag yuav yuam kev.
Tug kws zais nwg tej kev ntxub rua nruab sab, nwg daim tawv ncauj daag, hab tug kws ab ham luas yog tug tuabneeg ruag.
Yog ntau ncauj yeej yuav muaj kev txhum, tassws tug kws tswj nwg daim tawv ncauj mas nwg paub taab.
Tug kws ncaaj nceeg tug nplaig yog cov tseem nyaj, tug tuabneeg limham lub sab tsw muaj nuj nqes hlo le.
Tug kws ncaaj nceeg daim tawv ncauj yug tau tuabneeg coob coob, tassws tug kws ruag tuag vem tsw thoob tswb.
Yawmsaub tej koob moov ua kuas nplua nuj, nwg tsw ntxwv kev nyuaj sab rua.
Qhov kws ua txhum ua qas mas tug ruag saib yog kev lomzem xwb, qhov kws muaj tswvyim xyum zoo mas ua rua tug kws thoob tswb to nrog zoo sab.
Yaam kws tug tuabneeg limham ntshai yeej yuav lug raug nwg, yaam kws tug ncaaj nceeg ntshaw Vaajtswv yeej yuav pub.
Thaus cua daaj cua dub ntsawj tuaj tug tuabneeg limham pluj taag lawm, tassws tug kws ncaaj nceeg nyob ruaj khov moog ib txhws.
Tej kua qaub rhab nav le caag hab tej paa tawg nchu qhov muag le caag, tes tug cis nkeeg yuav zoo ib yaam le ntawd rua tug kws khaiv nwg.
Qhov kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub yuav txuas txujsa ntev moog, tassws tug tuabneeg limham lub naj lub xyoo yuav tsw ntev.
Qhov kws cov ncaaj nceeg vaam yuav tav rua txujkev zoo sab xyiv faab, tassws qhov kws cov tuabneeg limham vaam yuav pluj taag moog.
Yawmsaub yog lub chaw ruaj khov rua tug kws sab ncaaj, tassws nwg yuav rhuav tshem cov kws ua phem.
Cov kws ncaaj nceeg yuav tsw raug muab rhu pov tseg, tassws tug kws ua limham yuav tsw tau nyob huv lub tebchaws.
Tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg lub qhov ncauj nthuav tswvyim tawm lug, tassws tug nplaig ntxeev ntxag yuav raug muab txav pov tseg.
Tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg daim tawv ncauj paub tej lug kws hum luas, tassws tug tuabneeg limham lub qhov ncauj tsuas paub tej lug ntxeev ntxag xwb.
Raab teev kws ntxo luas Yawmsaub ntxub kawg le, tassws lub thauj teev kws hum ua rua nwg zoo sab.
Thaus khaav theeb lawm yuav raug poob ntsej muag, tassws tswvyim yuav nrug nraim tug kws tsw muab hlub.
Tug kws ncaaj nceeg txujkev ua ncaaj yuav coj nwg lub hauv ntej, tassws tug tuabneeg ntxeev ntxag txujkev nkhib nkhaus yuav rov ua rua nwg puam tsuaj.
Tej nyaj txag tsw muaj qaabhau rua nub kws Yawmsaub npau tawg, tassws txujkev ncaaj nceeg cawm kuas dim kev tuag.
Tug kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj, nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg yuav coj nwg kev ncaaj nraim, tassws tug tuabneeg limham yuav qaug ntawg rua huv nwg txujkev ua limham.
Tug ncaaj nceeg txujkev ua ncaaj yuav paab nwg dim, tassws tug tuabneeg ntxeev ntxag txujkev ntshaw yuav rov nteg tau nwg.
Thaus tug tuabneeg limham tuag, nwg txujkev vaam kuj pluj taag, tug kws tsw fwm Vaajtswv tej kws nwg xaav tau kuj pluj ntshws lawm.
Tug kws ncaaj nceeg tau kev dim qhov txom nyem, tassws tug tuabneeg limham yuav nyob nwg chaw raug txom nyem.
Tug kws tsw fwm Vaajtswv nwg lub qhov ncauj ua rua kwvtij zej zog puam tsuaj, tassws tug kws ncaaj nceeg kev txawj ntse paab tau nwg dim.
Thaus cov kws ncaaj nceeg noj qaab nyob zoo mas lub nroog kuj xyiv faab, thaus cov tuabneeg limham puam tsuaj taag kuj muaj suab qw zoo sab.
Tej koob moov kws cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tau, ua rua lub nroog vaam meej tuaj, tassws cov tuabneeg limham lub qhov ncauj ua rua lub nroog puam tsuaj.
Tug kws saib tsw taug kwvtij zej zog yog tug kws tsw thoob tswb, tassws tug kws paub qaabhau mas nyob tuabywv.
Tug kws cov zog taug xaiv pheej qha tej kws muab npog ca tshwm lug, tassws tug kws tso sab tau mas yeej npog tau tej ntawd ca.
Qhovtwg tsw muaj tug txawj coj tej pejxeem yuav qaug taag, tassws qhov kws muaj ntau leej ua chaw sablaaj yeej yuav nyob thaaj yeeb.
Tug kws laav lwm tug yuav raug kev ntxhuv sab, tassws tug kws tsw kaam laav lwm tug yuav nyob kaaj sab lug.
Tug quaspuj kws paub cai yeej tau koob meej, tassws tug quasyawg sab heev yuav tau nyaj txag.
Tug kws hlub luas yuav rov ua rua nwg tau zoo, tassws tug kws nyaum yuav rov ua rua nwg mob.
Tug tuabneeg limham tau cov nqe zug kws daag nwg xwb, tassws tug kws tseb txujkev ncaaj nceeg yuav tau tej nqe zug kws tseeb.
Tug kws khov kho huv txujkev ncaaj nceeg yuav muaj txujsa nyob, tassws tug kws lawv quas ncav txujkev phem yuav tuag.
Cov tuabneeg kws lub sab nkhaus, Yawmsaub ntxub kawg le, tassws cov kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj le ua rua Yawmsaub zoo sab.
Ca le paub tseeb tas tug tuabneeg phem yuav tsw dim kev teem txem, tassws tug kws ncaaj nceeg yuav tau kev cawm dim.
Tug quaspuj zoo nkauj kws tsw paub cai zoo le lub nplhaib kub kws npua coj ntawm qhov ntswg.
Qhov kws cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg ntshaw coj moog tau qhov zoo xwb, tassws qhov kws cov tuabneeg limham vaam coj moog txug Vaajtswv kev npau tawg.
Tug kws zoo sab pub dawb nwg nplua nuj quas zug, tug kws tsw kaam pub yaam kws nwg pub tau, nwg kuj pluag quas zug.
Tug kws lub sab daav pub tau yeej yuav nplua nuj, tug kws muab dej rua luas haus, luas kuj yuav pub dej rua nwg.
Tuabneeg tshev foom tug kws tuav nqe qoob loos tsw muag, tassws tug kws ca le muag, yuav tau moov zoo rua sau nwg lub taubhau.
Tug kws swv zug nrhav qhov zoo yeej yuav ua rua luas txaus sab rua nwg, tassws kev phem yuav raug tug kws nrhav qhov phem.
Tug kws tso sab rua nwg tej nyaj txag yuav qaug pluj taag, tassws tug kws ncaaj nceeg yuav hlub zoo yaam nkaus le tej nplooj ntoo ntsuab.
Tug kws tswm kev kub ntxhuv rua nwg tsev tuabneeg, mas thaus kawg nwg yuav tau cua ua qub txeeg qub teg xwb, hab tug ruag yuav ua tug ntse qhev.
Tug kws ncaaj nceeg tej num yog tsob ntoo kws pub txujsa, tassws qhov kws kwv tawv txuj kevcai yeej yog txuv txujsa.
Yog cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tau tej kws tswm nyog tau huv nplajteb nuav, mas cov tuabneeg limham hab muaj txem yimfuab yuav raug teem txem.
Tug kws nyam tej lug qhuab qha kuj yog nyam kev txawj ntse, tug kws ntxub tej lug qhuab ntuag yog tug ruag.
Yawmsaub txaus sab rua tug tuabneeg zoo, tassws tug kws ntaus tswvyim phem mas Yawmsaub yuav rau txem.
Txujkev limham ua tsw tau rua tuabneeg nyob ruaj nreeg, tassws cov kws ncaaj nceeg yuav cog caag tub dob tsw tau le.
Quaspuj zoo mas yog tug quasyawg lub mom kub, tassws tug quaspuj rhuav plhu zoo yaam le tug kaab mob kws ua rua nwg quasyawg tej pob txhaa lwj.
Tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tej kev xaav kuj ncaaj, tassws tug tuabneeg limham tej lug taw qha yog lug ntxeev ntxag.
Tug tuabneeg limham tej lug nyaag ntshws ua kuas lug ntshaav, tassws tug kws ncaaj nceeg lub qhov ncauj paab tuabneeg dim.
Tug tuabneeg limham raug rhuav tshem pluj taag lawm, tassws tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg lub tsev yuav nyob ruaj.
Tuabneeg yuav raug luas qhuas npaum le kws nwg muaj taab faab, tassws tug tuabneeg sab nkhaus yuav raug luas saib tsw taug.
