Tej lug qhuab ntuag nkaag rua huv tug tuabneeg thoob tswb tub dua le kws nplawm tug ruag ib puas nplawg.
Tug tuabneeg phem nrhav kev faav xeeb, tassws yuav muaj ib tug tub tshaaj xu nyaum moog tiv nwg.
Moog ntswb ib tug maum dais kws cov mivnyuas pluj lawm zoo dua le kws ntswb ib tug tuabneeg ruag kws ua tej num ruag.
Yog leejtwg ua phem pauj zoo, kev phem yuav tsw tawm huv nwg lub tsev moog.
Thaus chiv sws caav sws tshe kuj zoo yaam nkaus le tso lub paag dej nqeg, yog le ntawd ca le tseg ua ntej kws kev sws tshe sws ntaus tawm tuaj.
Tug kws tso tej tuabneeg txhum dim hab tug kws rau txem rua cov kws tsw txhum, mas ob tug kws ua le nuav Yawmsaub ntxub kawg le.
Ua caag tug tuabneeg ruag yuav rhu nyaj huv nwg txhais teg yuav tswvyim rua thaus kws nwg tsw txawj xaav daabtsw?
Tej phoojywg kuj muaj kev sws hlub txhua lub swjhawm, hab tej kwvtij kuj yug lug sws paab rua thaus muaj kev txom nyem.
Tug tuabneeg tsw thoob tswb txhad nrug luas cog lug, hab laav kwvtij zej zog.
Tug kws nyam kev txhum kuj nyam kev sws caav sws tshe, tug kws ua lub qhov rooj sab sab kuj yog nrhav kev puam tsuaj.
Tug kws lub sab nkhaus yuav tsw vaam meej, tug nplaig ntxeev xaiv poob rua qhov txom nyem.
Leejtxwv kws muaj tub tsw thoob tswb kuj muaj kev txhawj xeeb, hab leej txwv kws muaj tub ruag tsw muaj ntsej muag luag.
Lub sab xyiv faab yog cov tshuaj zoo, tassws kev poob sab ua rua pob txhaa qhuav.
Tug tuabneeg limham txais tej nyaj xab ntawm luas lub naab tsho lug qhau txujcai.
Tug kws thoob tswb to nrog tub, mas saib ntsoov rua tswvyim, tassws tug ruag lub qhov muag nuam rua qaab ntuj kawg.
Tug tub ruag ua rua leej txwv txhawj quas ntsuav hab ua rua leej nam kws yug ab sab.
Qhov kws muab tug ncaaj nceeg nplua kuj tsw zoo, qhov kws muab tug kws zoo nplawm kuj txhum.
Tug kws tswj tau nwg tej lug kuj yog nwg txawj ntse, tug kws muaj lub sab ntev kuj thoob tswb to nrog.
Tug ruag ua tuabywv kuj suav tas muaj tswvyim, thaus nwg qus nwg daim tawv ncauj kuj suav tas nwg txawj xaav.
Tug kws tawm moog ua twm zeej twm kawv ua lawv le nwg lub sab xwb, hab tawm tsaam suavdawg tej tswvyim zoo.
Tug ruag tsw zoo sab rua txujkev thoob tswb to nrog, tsuas yog zoo sab rua qhov kws nwg nthuav nwg tej kev xaav xwb.
Thaus tej kev limham lug txug, kev saib tsw taug kuj lug hab, thaus poob koob kuj raug txaaj muag hab.
Tej lug kws tuabneeg lub qhov ncauj has yog dej tub. Lub qhov dej txhawv kws pub tswvyim, yog tug dej ntsawj ceev.
Qhov kws tsaa tug tuabneeg txhum cai mas tsw zoo, hab qhov kws tu tsw ncaaj rua tug tsw txhum kuj tsw zoo.
Tug tuabneeg ruag daim tawv ncauj coj kev sws caav sws tshe lug, hab nwg lub qhov ncauj kuj hu raab nplawm lug.
Tug ruag lub qhov ncauj ua rua nwg puam tsuaj, hab nwg daim tawv ncauj kuj ua hlua cuab nwg.
Tug txom xaiv tej lug mas zoo yaam nkaus le tej zaub mov qaab kws nkaag hlo moog rua huv plaab.
Tug nkeeg ua num kuj nrug tug kws ua kuas puam tsuaj ua kwvtij.
Yawmsaub lub npe yog lub chaw tsom faaj kws ruaj khov, tug ncaaj nceeg dha moog rua huv hab nyob tso sab plhuav.
Tug nplua nuj tej nyaj txag yog nwg lub nroog kws ruaj khov, hab nwg xaam pum tas zoo yaam nkaus le lub ntsaa loog sab sab.
Ua ntej kws tsw tau raug kev puam tsuaj tuabneeg lub sab kuj khaav theeb. Xub txu fwjchim le maav tau koob meej.
Yog leejtwg teb ua ntej kws nwg tsw tau nov kuj yog nwg txujkev ruag hab kev txaaj muag.
Tuabneeg lub sab thev taug kev mob nkeeg, tassws leejtwg thev taug txujkev lwj sab?
Lub sab kws txawj xaav yeej tau kev txawj ntse, hab tug kws muaj tswvyim lub qhov ntsej nrhav kev txawj ntse.
Pub ib yaam daabtsw rua luas kuj yog qheb kev rua yug hab coj yug moog cuag cov kws ua hlub.
Tug kws xub pav nwg tshaaj plaub ua ntej mas saib zoo le muaj cai, moog txug thaus tug kws nrug nwg ua plaub tuaj tshawb nwg lub keeb.
Qhov kws rhu ntawv mas ua kuas tseg tsw sws caav sws tshe, hab txav txem rua ob tog tuabneeg luj kws ua plaub.
Tug kwvtij kws tau txais kev paab mas zoo le lub nroog ruaj khov, hab kev sws caav sws tshe mas zoo le tug laag rooj kws kaw lub chaw tsom faaj ruaj khov.
Lub qhov ncauj ua rua lub plaab tsau, tej kws daim tawv ncauj has ua rua yug txaus sab.
Kev caj kev tuag nyob ntawm tug nplaig le fwjchim, cov kws nyam swv tug nplaig rua zaaj twg yuav tau saws le ntawd.
Tug kws yuav tau quaspuj kuj yog tau yaam kws zoo, hab tau kev hlub ntawm Yawmsaub.
Tug kws pluag tsuas yog taij thov xwb, tassws cov nplua nuj teb lub suab nchaav.
Muaj tej tug phoojywg ua txuj nrug yug ua phoojywg, tassws muaj ib tug phoojywg kws sws raug zoo heev dua tej kwvtij txheeb.
Tug tuabneeg pluag kws taug txujkev ncaaj nceeg kuj zoo dua tug tuabneeg ruag kws has lug ntxeev ntxag.
Tug kws kub sab quas lug tassws tsw muaj kev txawj ntse kuj tsw zoo, hab tug kws ua kwtaw sai kuj pheej yuam kev.
Thaus leejtwg txujkev ruag coj kev puam tsuaj lug raug nwg, nwg kuj chim sab npau rua Yawmsaub.
Tej nyaj txag nqug kuas tau phoojywg coob, tassws tug pluag raug phoojywg muab tso tseg.
Tug cuav timkhawv yuav tsw dim qhov kws raug txem, tug kws pheej daag xwb yuav tsw dim.
Muaj tuabneeg coob nrhav kev hlub ntawm tug kws muaj meej, hab txhua tug kuj nrug tug kws pub tau rua puab ua phoojywg.
Tug tuabneeg pluag tej kwvtij kuj ntxub nwg, mas nwg tej phoojywg yeej los yuav tswv deb ntawm nwg. Nwg has lug rua puab los tsw muaj leejtwg noog le.
Tug kws tau tswvyim kuj yog hlub nwg tug kheej, tug kws khaws kev txawj ntse ca yuav vaam meej.
Tug cuav timkhawv yuav tsw dim qhov kws raug txem, tug kws pheej daag xwb yuav puam tsuaj.
Tug tuabneeg ruag tsw phim yuav swv nplua quas mag, yimfuab tsw tswm nyog tug qhev kaav cov thawj kws muaj meej.
Qhov kws thoob tswb to nrog ua rua tuabneeg tsw chim sai, hab qhov kws nwg tsw quav ntsej tej kws luas ua txhum rua nwg, kuj yog meej mom rua nwg.
Qhov kws vaajntxwv npau tawg zoo yaam nkaus le tsuv ntxhuav lub suab nyooj, tassws nwg txujkev hlub zoo yaam nkaus le tej dej lwg sau tej nyom.
Tug tub ruag yog kev plaag kev pluag rua leej txwv, tug quaspuj tsawm taug zoo yaam nkaus le naag lug nrug tuj tawv tsw tu.
Tej vaaj tse hab nyaj txag yog qub txeeg qub teg kws tau ntawm leej txwv lug, tassws tug quaspuj kws thoob tswb to nrog yog tau ntawm Yawmsaub lug.
Txujkev cis nkeeg ua rua tsaug zug ceev, hab tug cis nkeeg yuav raug kev tshaib.
Tug kws tuav txuj kevcai kuj tuav tau nwg txujsa, tug kws saib tsw taug tej lug qha yuav tuag.
Tug kws pub rua cov pluag kuj yog qev rua Yawmsaub, mas Yawmsaub yuav pauj tej kws nwg pub.
Ca le nplawm qhuab qha koj tug tub rua thaus tseed muaj sab vaam, tsw xob txav sab ca nwg moog puam tsuaj.
Tug kws npau tawg ceev kuj yuav raug txem, yog koj paab nwg ib zag lawm los kuj yuav rov paab dua hab.
Ca le noog tej lug taw qha hab khaws tej lug qhuab qha, koj txhad tau tswvyim rua tom hauv ntej.
Tuabneeg lub sab npaaj daag num ca ntau yaam, tassws tej kws Yawmsaub npaaj ca txhad le tav.
Yaam kws ntshaw huv lwm tug yog kev sws hlub, tug kws pluag kuj zoo dua tug kws daag.
Qhov kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub coj moog txug txujsa, hab tug kws tau lawd kuj nyob txaus sab hlo, tsw muaj kev phem lug raug nwg.
Tug cis nkeeg muab txhais teg tsau rua huv lub phaaj hab tub tsw yeem tsaa txhais teg ntaus mov lug rua lub qhov ncauj.
Ca le nplawm tug kws muab hlub mas tug kws tsw paub qaabhau txhad le kawm tau kev paub taab. Ca le qhuab ntuag tug kws thoob tswb to nrog nwg txhad le tau kev txawj ntse.
Tug kws ua nruj ua tswv rua nwg txwv hab ntab nwg nam tswv, yog tug tub kws tswm kev txaaj muag hab raug luas thuaj.
Kuv tub 'e, yog koj tso tej lug qhuab qha tseg mas koj yuav yuam kev ntawm tej lug kws tswvyim qha.
Tug timkhawv kws tsw tseeb kuj luag qhov kws tu plaub ncaaj, hab tuabneeg limham lub qhov ncauj noj nqog tej kev txhum txem.
Kev rau txem tub npaaj txhwj rua cov kws muab hlub, hab raab nplawm npaaj rua cov tuabneeg ruag nraus qaum.
Cawv txwv maab ua kuas thuaj luag, hab cawv ua kuas sws ntaus, leejtwg ca cawv coj nwg moog yuam kev kuj tsw muaj tswvyim.
Qhov kws vaajntxwv npau tawg ceev kuj zoo yaam nkaus le tsuv ntxhuav lub suab nyooj, tug kws zwg kuas vaajntxwv npau kuj yog sev tau nwg txujsa.
Qhov kws zaam dhau ntawm kev sws caav sws tshe kuj tau koob meej, tassws txhua tug tuabneeg ruag yeej sws caav sws tshe.
Tug cis nkeeg tsw laij laj rua lub caij laij, mas txug lub caij hlais nwg yuav moog nrhav qoob tassws tsw tau daabtsw le.
Tej kws tuabneeg xaav tseg ca huv nruab sab mas zoo yaam nkaus le dej tub, tassws tug kws thoob tswb to nrog txhad ntaus tau lug.
Muaj tuabneeg coob khaav txug puab kev sws hlub, tassws leejtwg nrhav tau ib tug ncaaj kws tso sab tau?
Tug ncaaj nceeg kws taug txujkev ua ncaaj ua nceeg, mas nwg cov tub yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug rua yaav tom qaab.
Vaajntxwv kws nyob sau lub zwm txwv tu plaub nwg yeej yuav tsoov txhua yaam kev phem kws nwg pum tawm moog.
Leejtwg yuav has tau tas, “Kuv tub ua kuv lub sab dawb sab huv lawm, kuv tub dawb huv tsw muaj txem”?
Lub thauj teev kws tsw hum txaj hab lub thoob luj kws tsw hum, mas Yawmsaub ntxub ob yaam nuav kawg le.
Txawm yog tej mivnyuas yau los qhov kws nwg ua kuj qha lub neej rua luas paub tas tej kws nwg ua yog dawb huv hab raug cai los tsw yog.
Lub qhov ntsej kws nov lug hab lub qhov muag kws pum kev puavleej yog Yawmsaub tswm.
Tsw xob nyam tsaug zug tsaam tes koj pluag, ca le qheb koj lub qhov muag koj txhad tau noj tsau.
Tug kws rhu nyaj yuav kuj has tas, “Tsw zoo, tsw zoo,” tassws thaus nwg coj dhau lawm nwg kuj khaav.
Kub hab qai zeb hlaws muaj nqes mas muaj ntau kawg le, tassws daim tawv ncauj kws has lug txawj ntse kuj yog lub qai zeb hlaws kws tswm txaj tshaaj plawg.
Ca le txais lub tsho ntawm tug kws muab laav lwm tug le nuj nqes, hab ca le khaws tej tiv thawj kws nwg muab laav lwm tug.
Tej zaub mov kws daag tau lug mas noj qaab kawg le, tassws tom qaab tswg zeb yuav puv nkaus lub qhov ncauj.
Tej hom phaj daag num yuav tsum yog sablaaj daav txhad tav, moog ntaus rog yuav tsum muaj cov txawj ntse qha.
Tug kws cov zog taug xaiv kuj yog thws lub qai rua luas, yog le ntawd tsw xob nrug tug ntau ncauj ua ke.
Yog leejtwg tshev foom nwg nam lossws nwg txwv, nwg lub teeb yuav tuag ndo tsaus ntuj nti.
Tej qub txeeg qub teg kws tau sai thaus ntxuv, mas thaus kawg kuj pluj tsw tau moov.
Tsw xob has tas, “Kuv yuav pauj qhov kws luas ua phem,” ca tog Yawmsaub mas nwg yuav paab koj.
Lub thauj teev kws tsw hum txaj mas Yawmsaub ntxub kawg le, raab teev kws ntxo kuj phem.
Tuabneeg txhais kwtaw yog Yawmsaub coj, mas tuabneeg yuav nkaag sab tau tuabneeg txujkev le caag?
Yog leejtwg laam has ua dog ua dig tas, “Nuav yog yaam dawb huv rua Yawmsaub,” kuj yog nwg rov cuab maag nwg, vem yog thaus xaav tau txhua, tub cog lug taag lawm.
Tug vaajntxwv kws muaj tswvyim tsoov cov tuabneeg limham hab tsuj pis ntag puab yaam le tsheb tsuj qoob.
Lub sab kws paub qhov phem qhov zoo yog Yawmsaub lub teeb ci thoob plhawv rua huv tuabneeg lub sab lub ntsws.
Txujkev hlub hab txujkev ua ncaaj, tuav tau vaajntxwv ca, hab txujkev ncaaj nceeg txhawb nqaa nwg lub zwm txwv.
Cov tub hluas lub koob meej yog qhov kws nwg muaj zug, tassws cov laug lub moo zoo yog qhov kws puab nyob dawb hau quas paug.
Qhov kws muab nplawm kuas to kuj yog txhuam tej kev phem tseg, qhov kws muab ntaus kuj yog ntxuav lub sab lub ntsws kuas huv.
Vaajntxwv lub sab yog tug nam dej kws nyob huv Yawmsaub txhais teg, Yawmsaub muab nwg lub sab tig lawv le Yawmsaub pum zoo.
Tuabneeg pum tas txhua yaam kws puab ua puavleej zoo, tassws Yawmsaub tshuaj huv lub sab.
Qhov kws ua ncaaj nceeg hab txav txem ncaaj, hum Yawmsaub lub sab heev dua le muab hov txhua chaw xyeem.
Lub qhov muag khaav theeb hab lub sab muab hlub, kws yog cov tuabneeg limham lub teeb mas puavleej txhum.
Tug tuabneeg nquag tej hom phaj yeej coj kuas nwg muaj nplua mag, tassws txhua tug kws maaj ua dog ua dig yeej tu pluag xwb.
Tej nam txhaab nyaj kws tug nplaig daag tau mas yog tej paa nchu kws nyob ib vuag dua xwb hab yog txujkev tuag rooj hlua.
Cov limham txujkev ua nruj ua tswv yuav kuav puab moog vem yog puab tsw yeem ua ncaaj rua luas.
Cov tuabneeg muaj txem txujkev yeej nkhaus, tassws tej kws cov tuabneeg dawb huv ua kuj raug cai.
Nyob sau ruv tsev zoo dua le nrug tug quaspuj tsawm taug nyob huv tsev.
Tug tuabneeg limham lub sab ntshaw ua phem, nwg tsw khuvleej nwg tej kwvtij zej zog.
Thaus tej tuabneeg muab hlub raug txem mas cov tuabneeg tsw thoob tswb kuj ntse tuaj, thaus tug kws muaj tswvyim raug luas qhuab qha, nwg kuj tau kev txawj ntse.
Vaajtswv kws ncaaj nceeg ua tuab zoo saib cov tuabneeg limham lub tsev, nwg muab cov tuabneeg limham laim pov tseg puam tsuaj taag.
Tug kws ntsaws qhov ntsej tsw noog tug pluag lub suab hu, nwg yuav hu tsw muaj leejtwg nov hab.
Ua tuabywv pub tshaav ntuj rua tug kws chim mas kev chim yuav pluj, muab nyaj xab ntsaws rua huv xubndag mas kev npau tawg yuav pluj.
Thaus tu plaub ncaaj kuj ua rua cov kws ncaaj nceeg zoo sab, tassws ua rua cov kws ua phem poob sab nthaav.
Tug kws zos txujkev thoob tswb to nrog, yuav moog nrug cov tuabneeg tuag nyob ua ke.
Tug kws nyam kev lomzem yuav pluag, tug kws nyam cawv txwv maab hab cov roj muaj nqes yuav tsw nplua nuj.
Cov tuabneeg limham yuav ua nqe txhwv cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, tug tuabneeg tsw ncaaj yuav theej tug ncaaj chaw.
Nyob tebchaws moj saab qhua mas zoo dua le nrug tug quaspuj tsawm taug ywg taug nyob ua ke.
Tej cuab txhaj cuab taam muaj nqes nyob huv tug kws muaj tswvyim lub tsev, tassws tug ruag nwg noj nwg le taag huvsw.
Tug kws lawv ncav txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab txujkev hlub yuav tau txujsa hab koob meej hab yuav vaam meej.
Tug kws muaj tswvyim nce moog ntaus tau cov tuabneeg kws muaj zug lub nroog, hab rhuav lub chaw ruaj khov kws puab tso sab pob taag.
Tug kws tswj tau nwg lub qhov ncauj hab nwg tug nplaig kuj tsom kwm tau nwg dim tej kev ceblaaj.
Tug kws tsaab ua luj hab khaav theeb npe hu ua tug muab hlub, mas nwg xyum khaav theeb tsw yuav kev yuav cai.
Tug cis nkeeg txujkev ntshaw yuav rov tua nwg, vem yog nwg txhais teg tsw kaam ua num.
Tug kws ua sab hlub kuj ua sab hlub ib nub tsaus ntuj, tassws tug ncaaj nceeg mas pheej pub tsw nkaum teg le.
Tej kws cov tuabneeg limham muab xyeem mas Yawmsaub ntxub kawg le, thaus puab coj tuaj ntawm lub sab kws xaav ua phem mas Yawmsaub yimfuab ntxub.
Tug cuav timkhawv yuav puam tsuaj, tassws tej lug kws tug noog lug has yuav nyob moog.
Tug kws limham nwg ua nwg lub plhu tuab kawg le, tassws tug ncaaj nceeg nwg ua tuab zoo saib nwg txujkev.
Tsw muaj tug tswvyim twg hab kev txawj ntse hab tej lug taw qha twg kws kov yeej tau Yawmsaub.
Npaaj neeg txhwj rua nub kws ua rog lawm, tassws qhov kws kov yeej nyob ntawm Yawmsaub.
Tswm nyog xaiv yuav lub koob meej zoo heev dua le xaiv nyaj txag ntau, hab xaiv qhov kws luas saib taug yug zoo dua le tau nyaj hab kub.
Txawm yog tug pluag hab tug nplua nuj los qhov kws sws thooj puavleej yog Yawmsaub tswm.
Tug kws paub taab pum xwm txheej tes nwg tswv nraim lawm, tassws tug tsw thoob tswb tseed phoom quas qeeg moog txhad raug ceblaaj.
Tug nqe zug kws txu fwjchim hab fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub yog kev muaj txag hab koob meej hab txujsa.
Xuav paug hab rooj hlua cuab nyob huv tug tuabneeg sab nkhaus txujkev, tug kws ceev faaj nwg lub neej yuav nyob deb tej nuav.
Ca le cob qha mivnyuas taug txujkev kws tswm nyog nwg moog, mas thaus nwg hlub lawd nwg txhad tsw ncaim ntawm txujkev hov.
Tug nplua nuj yuav kaav tug pluag, hab tug kws qev luas le tes yog ua luas qhev.
Tug tseb txujkev tsw ncaaj yuav saws txujkev lamswm, hab nwg txujkev npau tawg tug paas yuav pluj moog.
Tug kws lub sab daav yuav tau koob moov, tsua qhov nwg faib nwg tej zaub mov noj rua cov kws pluag.
Ca le ntab tug kws pheej thuaj luag tswv moog, txhad tsw muaj lug sws caav, mas kev sws caav sws tshe hab lug ab ham txhad pluj taag.
Tug kws nyam lub sab dawb huv hab tug kws has lug mog lug muas yuav tau nrug vaajntxwv ua kwvluag.
Yawmsaub lub qhov muag zuv rawv txujkev txawj ntse, tassws nwg rhuav cov tuabneeg ntxeev ntxag tej lug pov tseg.
Tug cis nkeeg has tas, “Muaj tsuv ntxhuav nyob saab nrau. Kuv yuav raug tsuv tum ntawm txujkev.”
Tug puj plhu tuab lub qhov ncauj yog ib lub qhov tub tub, tug kws Yawmsaub chim yuav poob rua huv lub qhov ntawd.
Txujkev ruag yeej nyob huv mivnyuas lub sab, tassws raab nplawm qhuab qha yuav lawv txujkev ruag tswv deb ntawm nwg.
Tug kws quab yuam tej pluag txhad tau nyaj txag ntau hab pub rua cov kws nplua nuj mas nwg yuav rov pluag xwb.
Tig koj lub qhov ntsej noog cov kws muaj tswvyim tej lug, hab kawm kuas paub kuv tej lug qhuab qha.
Yog koj khaws tej lug nuav ca huv nruab sab hab txhua lu nuav nyob txhwj ntawm koj daim tawv ncauj, mas yuav ua rua koj zoo sab.
Koj los maj, kuv tub qha rua koj paub nub nua sub koj txhad le tso sab rua Yawmsaub.
Kuv tub sau peb caug nqai rua koj, yog lug qhuab ntuag hab kev txawj ntse,
sub txhad qha rua koj paub tas yaam twg raug hab yaam twg tseeb, hab koj txhad teb tau tej lug tseeb rua cov kws khaiv koj moog.
Tsw xob lws tug tuabneeg pluag tsua qhov nwg pluag heev, tsw xob quab yuam cov kws raug kev txom nyem ntawm rooj loog kws tu plaub,
tsua qhov Yawmsaub yuav sawv puab chaw has plaub, hab yuav txeeb txujsa ntawm cov kws txeeb puab le lawm.
Tsw xob nrug tug kws chim taug ua phoojywg, hab tsw xob nrug tug kws npau sai ua ke,
tsaam koj kawm tau nwg zaaj tes koj nrug nwg ua ib nqaag moog maag ntxab.
Koj tsw xob ua tug kws laav luas hab nrug luas cog lug rws luas nuj luas nqe.
Yog koj tsw muaj daabtsw them luas, ua le caag koj tsua ca luas coj koj lub txaaj pw moog lawm?
Tsw xob txaav tej qub nrwm kws thau koj tej laug txhus ca.
Koj pum tug kws txawj txawj ua num los tsw pum? Nwg yuav tau moog nyob ntawm tej vaajntxwv xubndag, tsw yog nyob ntawm cov kws tsw muaj meej.
Thaus koj nyob tsawg nrug ib tug num tswv noj mov ua ke, koj yuav tsum ua tuab zoo saib daabtsw nyob ntawm koj xubndag.
Yog koj qaab lus heev, koj ca le muab raab rag kem koj cej daab.
Tsw xob ntshaw noj nwg tej zaub mov qaab qaab, vem tas tej zaub mov hov yuav ntxag tau koj.
Tsw xob khwv dhau fuas nyaj txag xwb, yuav tsum ntse tsw xob fuas le ntawd.
Thaus koj lub qhov muag saib quas ntsoov tej ntawd, kuj pluj plag lawm. Taamswm ntawd tej nyaj txag hov yeej muaj kauj tis yaa moog rua sau nruab ntug yaam nkaus le daav npoj.
Tsw xob noj tug tuabneeg cuam khum le zaub mov, tsw xob ntshaw noj nwg tej zaub mov qaab qaab,
tsua qhov nwg zoo yaam nkaus le tug kws pheej xaam nqe tej zaub mov hov huv lub sab. Nwg txhob koj tas, “Noj tag haus tag,” tassws nwg lub sab tsw has le ntawd.
Koj yuav ntuav tej zaub mov kws koj tau noj ntawd, hab yuav nkim koj tej lug mog lug muas.
Tsw xob has rua tej ruag tau nov, vem puab yuav saib tsw taug koj tej lug kws muaj tswvyim.
Tsw xob txaav tej qub nrwm, hab tsw xob naam tej mivnyuas ntsuag le teb,
tsua qhov tug kws cawm puab muaj zug heev, nwg yuav tuaj puab tog has plaub tawm tsaam koj.
Ca le muab tsua sau sab khaws tej lug qhuab qha, hab tig koj lub qhov ntsej noog tej lug txawj ntse.
Tsw xob tseg qhov kws nplawm qhuab qha mivnyuas, yog swv raab nplawm nplawm, nwg yuav tsw tuag.
Yog koj swv raab nplawm nplawm nwg, koj yuav paab tau nwg txujsa dim huv tub tuag teb.
Kuv tub 'e, yog koj lub sab ntse, kuv kuj yuav zoo sab hab.
Kuv tug ntsuj plig yuav xyiv faab rua thaus kws koj daim tawv ncauj has tej lug kws raug cai.
Tsw xob ca koj lub sab khib cov kws muaj txem, tassws yuav tsum ua koj lub neej fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub taag naj taag nub le.
Yog koj ua le ntawd koj lub hauv ntej yuav zoo hab koj yuav tsw nplaam tej kws koj vaam.
Kuv tub 'e, ca le noog hab ca le ntse, hab coj koj lub sab taug txujkev ncaaj ntawd.
Tsw xob moog nrug cov tuabneeg qaug cawv nyob ua ke, hab tsw xob nrug cov kws hu loj noj nqaj nyob ua ke.
Tsua qhov cov kws qaug cawv hab cov kws hu loj yuav raug txujkev pluag, hab txujkev tsaug zug ncaws quas nrws yuav muab tej khaub hlaab rua puab naav.
Ca le noog koj txwv kws yug koj, hab tsw xob saib tsw taug koj nam thaus nwg laug.
Ca le yuav qhov tseeb tsw xob muab muag, ca le yuav tswvyim hab tej lug qhuab qha hab kev thoob tswb to nrog.
Tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg leej txwv yuav zoo sab xyiv faab kawg, tug kws yug tau tug tub ntse yuav zoo sab rua tug tub.
Koj ca le ua kuas koj nam koj txwv zoo sab, ca le ua kuas tug kws yug koj zoo sab xyiv faab.
Kuv tub 'e, ca le muab koj lub sab rua kuv, hab ca koj lub qhov muag saib kuv txujkev.
Tug puj muag cev yog lub qhov tub, hab tug puj cov zej cov zog yog lub qhov dej kws nqaim.
Tug puj hov zuv tog yaam nkaus le tub saab, hab ua kuas muaj tuabneeg tsw ncaaj coob zuj zug.

Leejtwg muaj kev txom nyem? Leejtwg lwj sab quas ntsuav? Leejtwg muaj kev sws caav sws tshe? Leejtwg ywg le u le nuav? Leejtwg raug mob raug to kws tsw paub yog tim le caag? Leejtwg qhov muag lab quas khav?
Yog cov kws nyob tsau tsawv laav cawv, hab xyum haus tej cawv txwv maab kws tub muab tov sws xyaw lawm.
Tsw xob saib cov cawv txwv maab kws kua lab ploog hab laam quas thaab huv lub khob hab yoojyim nqog.
Thaus kawg cov cawv txwv maab yuav tum ib yaam le naab tum, hab ncaws ib yaam le tug naab muaj taug.
Koj lub qhov muag yuav pum tej yaam txawv txawv hab koj lub sab yuav has tej lug plhom moj quas ntsuav.
Koj yuav zoo yaam le tug kws pw huv lub nkoj huv plawv havtxwv, yuav zoo yaam nkaus le tug kws pw sau tug ncej dai daim ntaub nkoj.
Koj yuav has tas, “Puab ntaus kuv los tsw mob, puab tsoo kuv los kuv tsw nov. Kuv yuav tswm thaus twg? Kuv yuav nrhav lug haus dua.”
Tsw xob khib cov tuabneeg phem, tsw xob ntshaw nrug puab nyob ua ke,
tsua qhov puab lub sab ntaus tswvyim ua nruj ua tswv, hab puab daim tawv ncauj has tej lug kws yuav moog ua phem.
Swv tswvyim txhad ua tau lub tsev, hab muaj kev thoob tswb to nrog ua lub tsev nyob ruaj khov.
Hab muaj kev txawj ntse txhad ua rua tej chaav tsev muaj cuab txhaj cuab taam zoo zoo nkauj puv nkaus.
Tug kws muaj tswvyim muaj zug heev, tug kws txawj ntse kuj muaj zug tuaj.
Yog muaj cov txawj ntse qha mas koj txhad nqeg teg ua rog tau, hab muaj ntau leej ua chaw sablaaj koj txhad kov yeej.
Tswvyim nyob sab dhau tug ruag, ntawm lub rooj loog nwg tsw rua qhov ncauj has.
Tug kws ntaus tswvyim ua phem luas yuav hu tas tug thaab plaub.
Qhov kws ntaus tswvyim ua tej yaam ruag kuj txhum, hab tug kws thuaj luag yog tug kws tuabneeg ntxub kawg.
Yog koj poob sab nthaav rua nub kws koj raug ceblaaj, koj kuj tsw muaj zug.
Ca le cawm cov kws raug caab moog tua kuas dim, ca le paab tug kws raug caab nrhaaj nrhuj nrheev moog tua kuas dim.

Yog koj has tas, “Peb tsw paub zaaj nuav le,” mas Vaajtswv kws tshuaj saib lub sab yuav tsw pum lov? Tug kws zuv rawv koj tug ntsuj plig tsw paub hab lov? Nwg yuav tsw pauj rua tuabneeg lawv le puab tau ua lug lawm lov?
Kuv tub 'e, ca le noj zwb ntaab vem yog yaam kws zoo, hab zwb ntaab kws nrug ntawm lub tsev ntaab kuj qaab zwb heev.
Yuav tsum paub tas tswvyim zoo ib yaam le ntawd rua koj tug ntsuj plig, yog koj tau tswvyim, koj lub hauv ntej yuav zoo hab koj yuav tsw nplaam tej kws koj vaam.
Tsw xob zuv tog nrhw ib yaam le tej tuabneeg limham kws yuav lws tug ncaaj nceeg lub tsev, tsw xob ua nruj ua tswv rua nwg lub tsev,
tsua qhov tug ncaaj nceeg txawm qaug xyaa zag los tseed sawv lug hab, tassws tug tuabneeg limham raug vej sub vej sw muab ntxuav pov tseg.
Tsw xob zoo sab xyiv faab rua thaus koj tug yeeb ncuab qaug, hab tsw xob zoo sab rua thaus nwg dawm,
ntshai tsaam Yawmsaub pum tes yuav tsw txaus sab hab nwg yuav thim qhov kws nwg npau tawg rua koj tug yeeb ncuab.
Koj tsw xob nyuaj sab rua tej tuabneeg kws ua phem hab tsw xob khib cov kws ua limham,
tsua qhov tug tuabneeg phem tsw muaj lub hauv ntej zoo, hab tug tuabneeg limham lub teeb yuav raug muab tua.
Kuv tub 'e, ca le fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub hab vaajntxwv, tsw xob nrug tej tuabneeg kws faav xeeb ua ib lub sab,
tsua qhov ob tug yuav ua vej sub vej sw tshwm lug sai sai, mas leejtwg yuav paub tej kev puam tsuaj kws ob tug ua?
Tej lug nuav yog cov kws muaj tswvyim has. Qhov kws saib dej ua ntu saib tuabneeg plhu mas tsw zoo le.
Tug kws has rua tug tuabneeg limham tas, “Koj tsw txhum,” mas yuav raug tej pejxeem tshev foom hab raug tej tebchaws ntxub.
Tassws cov kws qhuab ntuag tug tuabneeg limham yuav tau nyob kaaj sab hab yuav tau koob moov.
Tug kws teb lu lug tseeb mas zoo le nwj daim tawv ncauj.
Ca le npaaj koj tej daag num saab nrau hab ua txhua yaam kuas txhwj huv koj daim teb, dhau ntawd kuj ua koj lub tsev.
Tsw xob laam ua timkhawv tum koj kwvtij zej zog kws tsw tau ua txhum, hab koj daim tawv ncauj tsw xob daag.
Tsw xob has tas, “Kuv yuav ua rua nwg yaam le nwg tau ua rua kuv lawm, kuv yuav ua pauj tej kws nwg tub ua lawm.”
Kuv hlaa huv tug cis nkeeg daim teb hab tug tsw thoob tswb lub vaaj txwv maab,
ua cav xuav paug tuaj puv nkaus, nroj tsuag tuaj ntum quas nti, hab tej ntsaa laaj kaab pob zeb pob taag.
Kuv pum hab ua tuab zoo xaav, kuv saib ntsoov mas kuv txhad tau kev qhuab qha.
Tsaug ib nyuas tswg zug, ib nyuas qe muag, khawm teg su ib plag,
mas txujkev pluag yuav lug txug koj yaam nkaus le tub saab tuaj lws, hab kev txom nyem yuav lug yaam nkaus le tug coj ntaaj coj rag tuaj lws.
Ntawm nuav yog Xalaumoo tej paaj lug kws Yuta tug vaajntxwv Hexekhiya cov tub teg tub taw sau ca.
Qhov kws Vaajtswv muaj koob meej yog qhov kws nwg npog ntau yaam ca, tassws qhov kws tej vaajntxwv tau koob meej yog qhov kws puab tshawb tau ntau yaam tshwm lug.
Lub ntuj nyob sab le caag hab lub nplajteb nyob tub le caag, kuj tshawb tsw tau tej vaajntxwv lub sab taag ib yaam le ntawd.
Ca le muab tej quav nyaj nchuav kuas tawm moog, mas txhad tau cov tseem nyaj rua tug Kws ua taig.
Ca le muab cov tuabneeg limham lawv tawm ntawm tug vaajntxwv xubndag moog, nwg lub zwm txwv txhad yuav nyob ncaaj nceeg moog le.
Tsw xob moog sawv tsaab ua luj rua ntawm vaajntxwv xubndag hab tsw xob moog sawv ntawm cov kws ua hlub lub chaw,
Qhov kws luas has tas, “Nce lug rua ntawm nuav,” zoo dua le raug muab lawv nqeg rua lub rooj qeg taab meeg cov thawj. Yaam kws koj pum
tsw xob maaj moog ua timkhawv rua huv tsev tu plaub tsaam muaj dua lwm tug ua rua koj poob ntsej muag mas thaus kawg koj yuav ua le caag?
Ca le nrug tug kws muaj plaub rua koj has kuas hum, tsw xob nthuav nwg lub qai rua lwm tug,
tsaam lwm tug tau nov tes koj raug txaaj muag hab luas yuav xyaav koj lub moo tsw zoo moog le.
Has tej lug zoo rua lub swjhawm kws cheem tsum has, mas zoo yaam nkaus le lub txwv duaj kub kws nyob huv lub taig nyaj.
Tug kws txawj ntse ntuag tug kws tig ntsej noog mas zoo yaam nkaus le nplhaib kub saw kub.
Daus xwb daus npu laaj txag rua lub caij sau qoob le caag, mas tug tub tshaaj xu kws ncaaj zoo le ntawd rua cov kws khaiv nwg moog, nwg ua rua cov kws khaiv nwg moog kaaj sab.
Tug kws khaav has tas nwg yuav pub yaam u yaam nuav tassws kuj tsw pub, mas zoo yaam nkaus le tej fuab cua kws tsw muaj naag.
Qhov kws ua sab ntev yuav haub tau num tswv, hab tug nplaig kws has lug mog lug muas yuav txu tau lub sab tawv.
Yog koj pum zwb ntaab ca le noj kuas txaus nkaus xwb, tsaam koj tsau dhau tes ntuav.
Koj txhais kwtaw kws moog cov zog huv luas tej tsev mas tsawg moog ib ntswv, tsaam tes luas dhuav hab ntxub koj.
Tug kws ua cuav timkhawv tum kwvtij zej zog kuj zoo yaam nkaus le tug qws lossws raab ntaaj lossws raab xub kws ntse.
Qhov kws tso sab rua ib tug kws tsw ncaaj thaus kws koj raug txom nyem, kuj zoo yaam nkaus le tug nav kws mob hab txhais kwtaw kws ceg tawv.
Tug kws hu nkauj rua tug kws lwj sab noog mas zoo yaam nkaus le tug kws hle nwg cev tsoog tsho rua nub kws no, hab zoo yaam nkaus le muab kua qaub laub rua lub kav txhaab.
Yog koj tug yeeb ncuab tshaib plaab tes muab mov rua nwg noj, yog nwg nqhes dej ca le muab rua nwg haus,
tsua qhov koj yuav rauv ib cub thee cig quas plawg rua sau nwg taubhau, mas Yawmsaub yuav muab nqe zug rua koj.
Cua ntsawj saab peg tuaj coj naag lug le caag, tug nplaig kws taug xaiv kuj coj lub ntsej muag chim lug ib yaam le ntawd.
Nyob sau ruv tsev zoo dua le nrug tug quaspuj tsawm taug nyob huv tsev.
Tej xuv zoo kws tuaj tebchaws deb tuaj kuj zoo yaam nkaus le khob dej txag rua tug kws nqhes.
Tug ncaaj nceeg kws swb tug tuabneeg limham zoo yaam nkaus le lub hauv dej av lossws lub qhov dej qas.
Qhov kws noj zwb ntaab ntau kuj tsw zoo, yog le ntawd yuav tsw xob has tej lug qhuas ntau dhau.
Tug kws tswj tsw tau nwg lub sab, kuj yaam nkaus le lub nroog kws pob taag tsw muaj ntsaa loog.
Lub koob meej muab rua tug kws ruag kuj tsw phim yaam nkaus le daus xwb daus npu lug rua lub caij ntuj kub hab naag lug rua lub caij sau qoob.
Yog yug tsw tau ua txhum mas tej lug foom tsw zoo yuav tsw raug ib yaam le tug noog piv kws yaa moog yaa lug hab yaam le tug luv kws yaa tsw tsaws.
Raab nplawm swv nplawm neeg, txuj xauv swv saam neeg luav, mas raab nplawm swv nplawm tug ruag nraus qaum.
Tsw xob teb tug ruag lawv le nwg txujkev ruag tsaam tes koj tsua zoo nkaus le nwg lawm.
Ca le teb tug ruag lawv le nwg txujkev ruag, tsaam tes nwg pum tas nwg ntse lawm.
Tug kws tso tug tuabneeg ruag xaa xuv kuj yog nwg txav nwg kwtaw pov tseg hab haus kev ab kev khwv.
Tej paaj lug kws nyob huv tug ruag lub qhov ncauj zoo ib yaam nkaus le txhais kwtaw kws luv dai vag swv tsw tau.
Tug kws muab koob meej rua tug kws ruag zoo ib yaam nkaus le nwg muab lub qai zeb hlaws khi rua ntawm txuj roj maab.
Tej paaj lug kws nyob huv tug ruag lub qhov ncauj zoo ib yaam nkaus le tug saus kws nyob huv tug qaug cawv txhais teg.
Tug kws ndav tug tuabneeg ruag lossws tug kws qaug cawv kws dua kev, kuj zoo ib yaam le tug kws tua neev ywj tua raug txhua leej txhua tug.
Tug ruag kws ua qhov ruag taag los ua thab, kuj zoo ib yaam nkaus le tug dev kws rov noj nwg cov ntuav.
Koj pum tug kws nwg xaav has tas nwg ntse los tsw pum? Tseed muaj vaam tug kws ruag heev dua le tug ntawd.
Tug cis nkeeg has tas, “Muaj tsuv ntxhuav nyob tom kev. Muaj tsuv ntxhuav nyob ntawm ntug moos.”
Lub qhov rooj qoj tau moog lug ntawm tug puab rooj le caag, tug cis nkeeg kuj ntxeev luj luam sau nwg lub txaaj pw ib yaam le ntawd.
Tug cis nkeeg muab txhais teg tsau rua huv lub phaaj, nwg nqaa txhais teg rua ntawm qhov ncauj txug sav kawg.
Tug kws cis nkeeg pum tas nwg ntse dua xyaa leej kws teb tau tej lug thoob tswb to nrog.
Tug kws ntxwg ceg rua huv luas tej lug sws caav sws tshe kws tsw thaab raug nwg, kuj zoo ib yaam le tug kws ntsab tug dev kws dha hlaa moog nplooj ntseg.
Tug kws daag lwm tug lawm los tsua has tas, “Kuv laam tawb koj xwb,” tes kuj zoo yaam le tug tuabneeg vwm kws laim hlaav suavtawg hab tua raab xub hab kev tuag tawm moog.
Yog tawg taag lawm suavtawg kuj tuag, hab yog tsw muaj tuabneeg lig xaiv kuj tseg tsw muaj lug sws caav sws tshe.
Thee ua rua cub tawg caj ncaig vug, hab tawg ua rua nplaim tawg ci le caag, tug kws pheej sws caav sws tshe tshaum kuas muaj lug sws caav sws tshe ib yaam le ntawd.
Tug lig xaiv tej lug zoo yaam nkaus tej zaub mov qaab qaab, kws nkaag hlo moog rua huv plaab.
Daim tawv ncauj nplag lub sab phem kuj zoo yaam nkaus le cov kua tshuaj kws muab luam rua lub taig aav.
Tug kws ntxub luas mas nwg daim tawv ncuaj zais lug, hab nwg cib nyeej rua nruab sab.
Thaus nwg has lug mog lug muas tsw xob ntseeg nwg tsua qhov ib puas tsaav yaam txujkev ntxub ntxaug nyob huv nwg lub sab.
Txawm yog nwg muaj tswvyim npog nwg txujkev ntxub ntxaug ca los nwg txujkev limham yuav tshwm plawg lug rua ib tsoom tuabneeg pum.
Tug kws khawb qhov taub cuab luas, nwg yuav poob rua huv lub qhov hov, tug kws dov pob zeb lug nwg yuav raug pob zeb tais.
Tug nplaig kws daag, ntxub tug kws nwg rhuav tshem, hab lub ncauj qaab rog qaab ntse coj kev puam tsuaj lug ze.
Tsw xob khaav txug pigkig tsua qhov koj tsw paub tas ib nub yuav muaj xwm txheej daabtsw tshwm lug.
Ca lwm tug qhuas koj, tsw xob ca koj lub qhov ncauj rov qhuas koj. Ca luas qhuas, tsw xob ca koj daim tawv ncauj qhuas.
Pob zeb kuj nyaav hab xuab zeb kuj nyaav, qhov kws tug tuabneeg ruag pheej zwg luas tseed nyaav dua ob yaam nuav huvsw.
Kev npau tawg kuj ua nruj ua tswv, kev chim kuj nyaab hlo, tassws leejtwg thev tau kev khib sab?
Raug luas ntuag taab meeg kuj zoo dua le luas hlub yug tuabywv xwb.
Phoojywg ntaus yug kuj tso sab tau, tassws yeeb ncuab mas nwj ntau dhau.
Tug kws noj tsau lawm, zwb ntaab nwg kuj dhuav, tassws tug kws tshaib mas txhua yaam kws ab kuj qaab zwb.
Tug kws tswv tawm ntawm nwg lub tsev moog, kuj zoo le tug noog kws tswv tawm huv lub zeg moog.
Roj hab tshuaj tsw qaab ua rua zoo sab, tassws phoojywg lu lug ntuag kws qaab zwb ua rua lub sab kaaj.
Tsw xob tso koj tej kwvluag hab koj txwv tej kwvluag tseg. Nub kws koj raug ceblaaj tsw xob moog rua koj tej kwvtij tsev. Tej phoojywg kws nyob ze zoo dua tej kwvtij kws nyob deb.
Kuv tub 'e, ca le ntse hab ua rua kuv zoo sab, sub kuv txhad le teb tau cov tuabneeg kws thuaj kuv.
Tug kws paub taab pum xwm txheej phem tes nwg tswv nraim lawm, tassws tug tsw thoob tswb tseed phoom quas qeeg moog txhad raug ceblaaj.
Ca le txais lub tsho ntawm tug kws muab laav lwm tug le nuj nqes, hab ca le khaws tej tiv thawj kws nwg muab laav lwm tug.
Tug kws sawv ntxuv tsaus ntuj nti moog foom koob moov nrov nrov rua kwvtij zej zog, luas yuav suav tas tej lug hov yog foom tsw zoo.
Naag lug kua tshauv ib nub dej nrug tuj tawv tsw tu le caag, tug quaspuj tsawm taug zoo ib yaam le ntawd.
Qhov kws cheem nwg kuj ib yaam le cheem cua xwb, lossws zoo ib yaam le txhais teg xws tuav tsw tau roj.
Muab hlau txhuam tau hlau ntse, tuabneeg ib leeg kuj qha tau ib leeg kuas ntse.
Tug kws tu tej txwv cua kuj yuav tau noj cov txwv ntawd, tug qhev kws tu nwg tug lospaav zoo yuav tau koob meej.
Tuabneeg pum tuabneeg lub plhu huv dej le caag, mas saib tej kws tuabneeg xaav kuj pum tas tuabneeg lub sab zoo le caag.
Tub tuag teb hab qhov puam tsuaj txhaws tsw paub puv le, hab tej kws tuabneeg lub qhov muag ntshaw kuj tsw txawj txaus.
Lub yeej vub swv nchuav cov tseem nyaj, lub cub thee swv nchuav cov tseem kub, tej lug qhuas yog swm tuabneeg lub sab.
Txawm yog muab tug tuabneeg ruag tuav xyaw qoob rua huv qhov cug los nwg txujkev ruag tsw tawm moog.
Koj yuav tsum paub koj paab tshws paab yaaj nyob zoo le caag, hab ua tuab zoo saib koj paab nyuj,
tsua qhov tej txhaab nyaj yuav tsw nyob moog ib txhws, hab lub mom vaajntxwv yuav tsw nyob rua txhua tam tuabneeg.
Thaus hlais tej nroj kws qhuav taag lawm mas hlaav dua zaub tshab tuaj, hab thaus sau tej zaub peg roob taag lawm,
mas koj yuav tau tsho naav ntawm mivnyuas yaaj hab yuav tau nqe yuav teb ntawm tshws.
Yuav muaj kua mig tshws txaus ua zaub mov rua koj hab koj tsev tuabneeg tau noj, hab yug tau koj tej nkauj qhev.
Cov tuabneeg limham ca le tswv, tub tsw muaj leejtwg lawv, tassws cov ncaaj nceeg muaj lub sab tuab ib yaam le tsuv ntxhuav.
Thaus muaj kev faav xeeb rua huv lub tebchaws mas muaj ntau leej sawv kaav, tassws muaj tug kws thoob tswb hab txawj ntse mas lub tebchaws yuav nyob ruaj nreeg ntev.
Tug tuabneeg pluag  kws quab yuam cov pluag zoo yaam nkaus le pluav naag kws hlub kawg ua rua qoob loos pam taag.
Cov kws muab txuj kevcai tso tseg yeej qhuas cov tuabneeg limham, tassws cov kws tuav rawv txuj kevcai kuj tawm tsaam puab.
Cov tuabneeg phem tsw to taub txujkev ua ncaaj, tassws cov kws nrhav Yawmsaub mas to taub huvsw.
Tug tuabneeg pluag kws taug txujkev ncaaj nceeg kuj zoo dua tug tuabneeg nplua nuj kws ua nkhib nkhaus.
Tug kws tuav rawv txuj kevcai yog tug tub kws ntse, tassws tug kws nrug tug tuabneeg tsw tsheej haaj ua phoojywg ua rua leej txwv poob ntsej muag.
Tug kws sau paaj nyag ntau hab nrhav nyaj lug tsaav rua nwg txhaab nyaj, tsuas yog nwg khaws ca rua lwm tug tau hlub tej pluag xwb.
Yog leejtwg tsw quav ntsej txuj kevcai, mas nwg tej lug thov yog yaam kws Yawmsaub ntxub xwb.
Tug kws coj tug ncaaj nceeg yuam kev taug txujkev phem, nwg yuav poob rua huv nwg lub qhov taub. Tassws tug kws tsw tau ua txhum yuav tau tej qub txeeg qub teg kws zoo.
Tug kws nplua nuj nwg pum tas nwg txawj ntse, tassws tug pluag kws thoob tswb to nrog yeej paub tug nplua nuj zoo le caag.
Thaus tug ncaaj nceeg kov yeej, muaj kev zoo sab xyiv faab ntau heev, tassws thaus tug tuabneeg limham tau fwjchim tej tuabneeg kuj moog tswv nraim.
Tug kws npog nwg tej kev txhum ca yuav tsw vaam meej, tassws tug kws leeg lub txem hab tso tej kev txhum tseg yuav tau kev khuvleej.
Tug kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub tsw tu le, yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug, tassws tug kws ua lub sab tawv yuav poob rua huv vej sub vej sw.
Tug thawj coj limham kws kaav tej tuabneeg pluag kuj zoo yaam nkaus le tug tsuv ntxhuav nyooj quas lawg lossws yaam le tug dais kws dha lug tum.
Tug thawj coj kws tsw thoob tswb to nrog kuj quab yuam nyaum heev, tassws tug kws ntxub tej kws tau ntawm kev ua tsw ncaaj nwg lub naj lub xyoo yuav ntev moog.
Leejtwg tua lwm tug es muaj vej sub vej sw lawm mas ca nwg tswv moog taag swm neej tsw xob kheev leejtwg paab nwg.
Tug kws ua lub neej ncaaj yuav tau kev cawm dim, tassws tug kws ua nkhib nkhaus yuav poob qhov taub.
Tug kws laij laj yuav muaj mov noj ntau, tassws tug kws ua tej num tsw muaj qaabhau yuav pluag heev.
Tug kws ua ncaaj yuav tau moov zoo ntau, tassws tug kws maaj nplua nuj yuav tsw dim kev teem txem.
Qhov kws saib dej ua ntu saib tuabneeg plhu mas tsw zoo, tassws tau ib pluag mov xwb tes yeej yuav ua tsw ncaaj.
Tug kws qa dub maaj nroog nrhav nyaj txag, tassws nwg tsw paub tas kev txom nyem yuav lug raug nwg.
Tug kws qhuab ntuag luas mas luas yuav rov hlub nwg heev dua tug kws lub qhov ncauj qaab zwb nplaig qaab ntse.
Tug kws nyag nwg nam nwg txwv tej hov txhua chaw los tseed has tas, “Tsw txhum,” kuj yog nwg nrug tug kws ua kev puam tsuaj ua phoojywg.
Tug kws sab hlub tshaum kuas muaj kev sws caav sws tshe, tassws tug kws tso sab rua Yawmsaub yuav vaam meej.
Tug kws tso sab rua tej kws nwg xaav kuj yog ruag, tassws tug kws ua lawv le tswvyim yuav tau kev cawm dim.
Tug kws pub rua tej pluag nwg yuav tsw tu pluag, tassws tug kws qe muag nti tsw hlub tej pluag yuav raug foom tsw zoo heev kawg.
Thaus cov tuabneeg limham tau fwjchim tej tuabneeg kuj moog tswv nraim, tassws thaus puab puam tsuaj taag lawm, cov kws ncaaj nceeg yuav fuam vaam coob tuaj.
Tug kws pheej raug qhuab ntuag los tseed kwv cov kwv tawv tsw noog, mas ib plag ntshws xwb yuav raug kev puag ntsoog khu tsw tau.
Thaus cov ncaaj nceeg tau fwjchim tej pejxeem xyiv faab, tassws thaus cov tuabneeg limham tau kaav, tej pejxeem kuj ntsaaj quas lawg.
Tug kws nyam tswvyim kuj ua rua leej txwv zoo sab, tassws tug kws pheej ndav puj muag cev kuj yog muab nwg tej nyaj txag nchuav pov tseg xwb.
Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav ncaaj coj lub tebchaws nyob ruaj, tug kws quab yuam sau nyaj txag kuj ua rua lub tebchaws puam tsuaj.
Tug kws ncauj qaab zwb nplaig qaab ntse rua kwvtij zej zog kuj yog nwg cuab hlua rov maag nwg kwtaw.
Tug tuabneeg phem nwg maag nwg le kev txhum txuj hlua, tassws tug ncaaj nceeg hu nkauj xyiv faab hlo.
Tug ncaaj nceeg paub tug pluag txujcai, tassws tug limham tsw nkaag sab tej nuav.
Cov kws pheej thuaj lwm tug ua rua lub nroog kub nyab, tassws cov kws txawj ntse tswj kuas tej kev npau tawg pluj moog.
Yog tug ntse nrug tug ruag sws caav sws tshe, tug ruag tsuas muaj kws npau tawg hab luag xwb, hab tsw muaj kev tug le.
Cov kws noj nyoog kuj ntxub tug kws dawb huv, hab nrhav quas ntshw txuv cov ncaaj nceeg txujsa.
Tug kws ruag yeej ua nwg kev chim tshwm taag nrho lug, tassws tug txawj ntse tswj tau nwg txujkev npau ca tuabywv.
Yog tug thawj ntseeg tej lug daag, mas nwg cov tub teg tub taw yuav limham taag huvsw.
Tug kws pluag hab tug kws quab yuam qhov kws sws thooj yog qhov kws Yawmsaub pub qhov kaaj rua ob tug qhov muag ib yaam nkaus.
Yog vaajntxwv tu plaub ncaaj rua cov pluag, mas nwg lub zwm txwv yuav nyob ruaj khov ib txhws.
Raab nplawm hab lu lug qhuab ntuag pub tswvyim, tassws tug mivnyuas kws muab tso ywj sab coj kev txaaj muag rua leej nam.
Thaus cov tuabneeg limham tau fwjchim tuav daag num, muaj tej kev faav xeeb luj quas zug, tassws cov ncaaj nceeg yuav pum ntsoov puab raug kev puam tsuaj.
Ca le nplawm qhuab qha koj tug tub nwg txhad ua rua koj nyob sab tug yeeg hab ua rua koj zoo sab.
Qhovtwg tsw muaj kev qha Vaajtswv tej lug, mas tej pejxeem kuj tseg tsw tswj lub sab, tassws tug kws tuav rawv txuj kevcai mas tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Yog tsuas xuas ncauj has xwb mas cob qha tsw tau tug tub qhe, txawm yog nwg nkaag sab los nwg kuj tsw quav ntsej.
Koj pum tug ncauj sai los tsw pum? Tseed muaj vaam tug kws ruag heev dua le tug ntawd.
Tug kws hlub nwg tug tub qhe heev txwj thaus yau lug, mas thaus kawg yuav pum tas tug tub qhe yuav tau nwg tej qub txeeg qub teg.
Tug kws npau tawg pheej tshaum kuas muaj lug sws caav sws tshe, hab tug kws chim taug kuj ua hauv paug faav xeeb luj.
Kev khaav theeb yuav ua rua tug khaav theeb poob qeg, tassws tug kws txu fwjchim yuav tau koob meej.
Tug kws nrug tub saab koom teg kuj yog nwg ntxub nwg txujsa, nwg tau nov tej lug twv tsawm los nwg tsw has daabtsw le.
Qhov kws ntshai tuabneeg yuav ua rooj hlua rov cuab yug, tassws tug kws tso sab rua Yawmsaub kuj nyob tso sab plhuav.
Tuabneeg coob nrhav kev ua kuas tug thawj coj hlub puab, tassws Yawmsaub yog tug kws txav txem ncaaj rua tuabneeg.
Tug tsw ncaaj mas cov ncaaj nceeg kuj ntxub kawg le, tassws tug ua ncaaj mas cov limham kuj ntxub kawg le.
Yakhe tug tub Aku kws nyob huv lub moos Maxas tej lug. Aku has rua Ithi‑ee, nwg has rua Ithi‑ee hab Ukhaa tas,
“Qhov tseeb kuv ruag dhau kws yuav ua tau tuabneeg, kuv tsw paub taab le tej tuabneeg.
Kuv tsw tau kawm paub tswvyim, hab tsw paub Vaajtswv tug kws dawb huv.

Leejtwg tau nce moog rua sau ntuj kaag hab nqeg rov lug? Leejtwg muab tau cua lug tuav rua huv xwb teg? Leejtwg muab ntaub qhwv tau dej ca? Leejtwg tu nrwm rua lub nplajteb nyob? Nwg lub npe hu le caag, hab nwg tug tub npe hu le caag? Mej yeej los paub.
“Muab Vaajtswv txhua lu lug tshuaj saib mas pum tas muaj tseeb tag, Vaajtswv yog daim hlau thaiv cov kws moog nraim cev rua huv nwg.
Tsw xob ntxwv ib lu lug rua huv nwg tej lug, ntshai tsaam nwg yuav ntuag koj hab luas yuav pum tas koj yog tug daag.
Vaajtswv, kuv thov ob yaam ntawm koj, thov pub rua kuv ua ntej kws kuv tsw tau tuag.
Thov muab tej lug tsw muaj tseeb hab tej lug daag ntab tswv deb ntawm kuv, thov tsw xob ca kuv pluag hab tsw xob ca kuv nplua nuj, thov pub rua kuv noj kuas txaus nkaus xwb,
tsaam kuv noj tsau tes tsw leeg yuav koj hab has tas, ‘Yawmsaub yog leejtwg?’ lossws tsaam kuv pluag hab ua tub saab hab ua puag tsuas kuv tug Vaajtswv lub npe.
“Tsw xob thuaj tug tub qhe rua tug lospaav noog, tsaam tug tub qhe foom koj tes koj yuav raug txem.
Muaj tej tug foom tsw zoo rua nwg txwv, hab tsw foom koob moov rua nwg nam.
Muaj tej tug nwg xaam pum tas nwg dawb huv, tassws kuj tsw tau ntxuav kev phem kev qas pov tseg.
Muaj tej tug mas nwg taubhau sab, hab lub qhov muag saib tsw taug lwm tug.
Muaj tej tug nwg kaug nav yog nav ntaaj, hab nwg nav yog nav rag, mas nwg yuav noj cov pluag kuas taag huv nplajteb hab cov tuabneeg txom nyem kuas pluj taag huv ib tsoom tuabneeg.
“Nplaj hab muaj ob tug mivnyuas yog maum, pheej qw has tas, ‘Pub, pub.’ Muaj peb yaam pheej tsw tsau, muaj plaub yaam tsw has ib zag tas, ‘Txaus lawm,’ yog le nuav,
tub tuag teb hab tug puj mooj, hab lub nplajteb pheej nqhes dej, hab suavtawg tsw has ib zag tas, ‘Txaus lawm.’
“Lub qhov muag kws thuaj luag leej txwv hab saib tsw taug leej nam hab tsw noog lug, yuav raug uab voj kws nyob huv haav tho hab raug daav noj twm noj.
Muaj peb yaam kws kuv phemfwj kawg, muaj plaub yaam kws kuv tsw nkaag sab, yog le nuav,
qhov kws tug daav yaa sau nruab ntug, hab qhov kws naab ndaug sau pob zeb, hab qhov kws lub nkoj moog rua huv plawv havtxwv, hab qhov kws hluas nkauj hluas nraug sws nyam.
“Tug quaspuj kws moog deev luas quasyawg ua lub neej zoo le nuav, nwg noj taag so qhov ncauj tes nwg has tas, ‘Kuv tsw tau ua txhum daabtsw le.’
Muaj peb yaam kws ua rua lub nplajteb tseeg quas nkawg, muaj plaub yaam kws lub nplajteb thev tsw taug, yog le nuav,
tug qhev tau ua vaajntxwv, hab tug ruag tau noj tsau npo,
hab tug quaspuj kws tsw muaj leejtwg nyam tau quasyawg, hab tug nkauj qhev tau nyob nwg tug puj lospaav chaw.
“Muaj plaub yaam huv nplajteb nuav kws miv kawg tassws muaj tswvyim tshaaj plawg, yog le nuav,
ntsaum yog ib co kws tsw muaj zug tassws thaus lub caij sau qoob ntsaum kuj npaaj tej kws noj khaws ca,
ntxwm tsua kuj yog ib co kws tsw muaj zug los nwg ua zeg rua huv tej kem zeb,
kooj ntaas tsw muaj vaajntxwv los nwg tseed moog tau ua ib kaab saab,
quav tuj quav taug koj nteg tau huv koj txhais teg los nwg tseed tau nyob huv vaajntxwv tsev.
“Muaj peb yaam kws txawj moog kev zoo nkauj, muaj plaub yaam kws txawj tshais ruam zoo saib, yog le nuav,
tsuv ntxhuav kws yog tug tsaj kws muaj zug tshaaj plawg hab tsw thim tswv ntawm lwm yaam le,
tug lauv qab cooj kws moog kev khov kho, hab tug txwv tshws, hab tug vaajntxwv kws moog kev ua cov pejxeem ntej quas ndais.
“Yog koj tsw paub taab es koj tsaab ua luj lossws yog koj ntaus tswvyim ua phem, ca le muab koj txhais teg pus koj lub qhov ncauj.
Yog tsu kua mig txha tau kua mig nyeem, yog tsu qhov ntswg txhad tau ntshaav, hab yog tshaum kuas chim txhad tau kev sws caav sws tshe.”
Nuav yog Lemu‑ee kws yog vaajntxwv huv lub moos Maxas tej lug kws nwg nam qha rua nwg.
“Kuv tub 'e, kuv tug tub kws kuv yug, au kuv tug tub kws kuv cog lug tseg,
tsw xob nkim koj tug zug rua ntau tug quaspuj, tsw xob muab koj tug kheej rua cov kws txuv tau vaajntxwv puam tsuaj.
Au Lemu‑ee, tsw tswm nyog le, tsw tswm nyog kws vaajntxwv yuav haus cawv txwv maab, lossws cov thawj kaav ntshaw haus cawv ntxws,
tsaam puab haus tes puab tsua nov qaab tej lug kws nyob huv txuj kevcai, hab qhau txhua tug kws raug kev txom nyem txujcai.
Ca le muab cawv ntxws rua tug kws saamswm puam tsuaj, hab muab cawv txwv maab rua cov kws nyuaj sab kawg.
Ca puab haus puab txhad nov qaab puab txujkev pluag, hab tsw ncu puab txujkev ab kev khwv dua le lawm.
Koj ca le rua ncauj paab cov kws tsw txawj has lug has puab tej plaub, hab paab has txhua tug kws raug luas tso tseg lawm txujcai.
Ca le rua ncauj tu plaub ncaaj nceeg, hab tuav cov kws pluag hab txom nyem txujcai.”
Tug quaspuj kws zoo mas leejtwg nrhav tau? Nwg tswm txaj dua tej npauj nyaj npauj kub.
Tug quasyawg tso sab plhuav rua nwg, hab nwg yuav tsw tu ncua ib yaam daabtsw le.
Nwg ua zoo rua tug quasyawg, tsw ua phem ib swm neej le.
Nwg nrhav plaub yaaj hab xuv maaj, nwg swv nwg txhais teg rau sab ntso ua num.
Nwg zoo yaam nkaus le tub laag tub luam lub nkoj txwg, nwg coj nwg tej zaub mov deb deb le lug.
Nwg sawv ntxuv thaus tsaus ntuj nti hab npaaj zaub mov rua nwg tsev tuabneeg noj, hab tu daag num rua nwg tej nkauj qhev ua.
Nwg ua tuab zoo saib tej laj teb mas rhu nyaj yuav ca, nwg swv tej nyaj txag kws nwg khwv tau cog txwv maab.
Nwg sa hlaab sev khov kho kuas muaj zug npho, nwg teg txawj teg nquag.
Nwg pum ntsoov nwg kev laag luam muaj tshaaj thawj. Mo ntuj los nwg taws teeb ua num.
Nwg txhais teg saws ntuag tshuab ntuag qaiv ntxaiv.
Nwg sab daav paab tej pluag, nwg cev teg paab cov txom nyem.
Nwg tsw ntshai daus xwb daus npu lug txug nwg tsev tuabneeg tsua qhov nwg tsev tuabneeg txhua tug tub muaj tsoog tsho suv  lawm.
Nwg ntus ntaub pua nwg chaw pw, nwg naav tej tsoog tsho ntaub maag kws zoo zoo hab ntaub yimlaaj.
Nwg tug quasyawg yog tug kws suavdawg paub zoo ntawm rooj loog rua thaus nrug ib tsoom kev txwj quas laug sablaaj.
Nwg muab tej ntaub maag xaws tsoog tsho muag hab xaa tej hlaab sa rua tub luam.
Nwg tug zug hab nwg tej kev zoo yog lub zaam kws nwg naav, nwg luag tej xwm txheej kws yuav tshwm lug tom hauv ntej.
Nwg rua ncauj has lug ntse ntsuav, nwg tug nplaig qha luas ntawm txujkev hlub.
Nwg ua tuab zoo tu nwg tsev tuabneeg, nwg tsw nyob nkaum teg nkoog.
Nwg tej mivnyuas kuj qhuas nwg ncu nwg txaj ntswg, nwg tug quasyawg kuj qhuas nwg has tas,
“Tej quaspuj ntau leej ua zoo kawg, tassws koj yog tug zoo tshaaj dua puab huvsw.”
Ncauj lug zoo yog daag ntxag xwb hab qhov zoo nkauj tsw muaj qaabhau, tassws tug quaspuj kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub mas tswm nyog qhuas.
Ca le muab nqe zug rua tej num kws nwg txhais teg ua, hab ca suavdawg qhuas nwg ntawm rooj loog vem nwg teg num zoo.
